['', '- Demonstrated analytical, decision-making and problem-solving skills', '- Effective presentation, verbal and written communication skills, and ability to facilitate collaborative sessions', 'The UXDesign Researcher conducts and delivers user experience (UX) design research work that meets or exceeds the stated business goals and which is clearly and objectively measured and reported to prove our return on design investment. Leads and crafts UX research to ensure excellence in research, facilitation, artifacts, presentation skills, and distilling actionable insights for partners. Partners effectively with other UX disciplines, business line clients, product and channel management, marketing, analytics, delivery PMO, Information Technology and other teams to strengthen relationships and understand the business while delivering solid research. Derives measurable objectives against which UX research work will be evaluated for success.', 'Preferred Skills/Experience', 'Basic Qualifications', '- Familiar with agile project management and how UX research functions within it', '- Familiar with a variety of research methodologies, when to apply them, and when to make tradeoffs', '- Ability to deliver impactful and clear UX design research in a way that drives and directs better product/project outcomes', '*This position is located in Atlanta, Minneapolis or San Francisco and will require working in office once COVID restrictions end*', '- Bachelor’s degree, with an emphasis on UX, design research, psychology, social science or another relevant field preferred, or equivalent experience', '- Three to five years of UX design research experience']

['', 'Tencent Games Global Publishing Center Tech Team is the international unit of Tencent Games, a leading global platform for game development, publishing and operation. Aiming to improve our games and transform the gaming industry, our mission is to solve the toughest challenges in gaming with technology.', ' Build machine learning models and utilize data analysis to deliver scalable solutions to business problems. Run A/B experiments, gather data, and perform statistical analysis. Establish scalable, efficient, automated processes for large-scale data analysis, machine-learning model development, model validation and serving. Work closely with software engineers on detailed requirements, technical designs and implementation of end-to-end solutions in game production, publishing and live-ops. Research new machine learning approaches.', ' Establish scalable, efficient, automated processes for large-scale data analysis, machine-learning model development, model validation and serving.', 'If you like us are ambitious and self-driven, we invite you to explore Tencent Games Global Publishing Center Tech Team and take challenges that will create new adventures for billions of players.', ' M.S., or Ph.D. in a quantitative discipline like computer science, machine learning, and math/statistics; Ph.D. with Strong publication record preferred;', ' Breadth and depth knowledge of machine learning algorithms and best practices;', ' Experience programming in Python, SQL, Java, C++ or related language;', ' 3+ years of experience of building machine learning models for business application preferred;', ' Research new machine learning approaches.', ' Experience with Big Data technologies such as Hadoop, Spark, Pig, Hive, etc. preferred.', '【Qualifications And Skills】', ' Build machine learning models and utilize data analysis to deliver scalable solutions to business problems.', ' Work closely with software engineers on detailed requirements, technical designs and implementation of end-to-end solutions in game production, publishing and live-ops.', "With offices in Palo Alto and around the world, our growth strategy is to build upon attracting the best talent and creating an amazing work atmosphere that balances the energy of a start-up with the resources of a global innovation leader. As the world's leading technology company, we maintain an entrepreneurial spirit and an open mindset.", ' Run A/B experiments, gather data, and perform statistical analysis.', 'If you are passionate about the gaming industry and eager to do groundbreaking work in a friendly, cross-cultural environment, we can provide unparalleled stability, resources, access to more than a billion players, and an international perspective.', ' Expert in statistical analysis (probabilities, hypothesis testing, multivariate analysis, time series analysis, generalized linear model, A/B experiments) ;', ' M.S., or Ph.D. in a quantitative discipline like computer science, machine learning, and math/statistics; Ph.D. with Strong publication record preferred; 3+ years of experience of building machine learning models for business application preferred; Breadth and depth knowledge of machine learning algorithms and best practices; Expert in statistical analysis (probabilities, hypothesis testing, multivariate analysis, time series analysis, generalized linear model, A/B experiments) ; Experience programming in Python, SQL, Java, C++ or related language; Experience with Big Data technologies such as Hadoop, Spark, Pig, Hive, etc. preferred.']

['At LivePerson, people from diverse backgrounds come together to do their best work and be their authentic selves. We are proud to be an equal opportunity employer.\xa0', 'You believe data-driven decision making is the norm', 'All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to age, ancestry, color, family or medical care leave, gender identity or expression, genetic information, marital status, medical condition, national origin, physical or mental disability, protected veteran status, race, religion, sex (including pregnancy), sexual orientation, or any other characteristic protected by applicable laws, regulations and ordinances. We also consider qualified applicants regardless of criminal histories, consistent with legal requirements.', 'Prior working experience in one of deep learning frameworks, such as Keras, PyTorch, & Tensorflow\xa0', 'Work together with data scientists to help test and integrate high-quality machine learning models that scale to handle large volumes of data in real-time and production-grade scalable software', 'LivePerson is a transformational force in how brands and consumers communicate. ['', 'Summit, NJ', 'Description:', 'JOB ID # 20-23574                            ', '\xa0 ', 'Description: ', '+ Months', 'Industry', ' ', '\xa0  Clinical Research Scientist e', 'Pharmaceutical', 'JOB ID #', 'Pharmaceutical\xa0', 'Responsibilities will include, but are not limited to, the following:  1.Assist the Clinical Research Scientist team to interface with project team members including: Clinical Research Physician, Clinical Operations, Data Management, Statistics, Drug Safety, Regulatory and Project Management.  2.Review and query of hematology/oncology data including: safety, primary efficacy variables, and laboratory data.  3.Assist with protocol preparation (writing, reviewing, amending and cross-functional facilitation as appropriate).  4.Assist with Study Start up Activities and data base build  5.Participate or lead in Scientific meetings (ie Ad-Board, Steering Committee, Data Monitoring Committee)   Skills/Knowledge Required: - Minimum 6 yrs. experience in oncology/hematology clinical development - Excellent written and verbal communication skills and interpersonal skills. - Knowledge of clinical trial design, basic statistics, and data review tools - Proficient at data interpretation - Experience in protocol development, study report preparation, Investigator Brochure preparation, regulatory submissions - Full understanding GCP and ICH Guidelines - Detail-oriented, well-organized - Ability to assimilate technical and scientific information quickly - Proficient in Microsoft Office (Word, Excel, PowerPoint; Microsoft project a plus), JReview, EDC (Rave) - Demonstrated ability to work as part of a team  Hematology experience (plus). ['', 'Coupang\u202fis a global company with offices in Beijing, Los Angeles, Seattle, Seoul, Shanghai, and Silicon Valley.\xa0', 'Job Overview:', 'As our Sr. Principal Machine Learning Engineer for\xa0Growth Engineering, you will play a strategic role in supporting innovation and be responsible for making our platforms & services data driven and intelligent leveraging data science. You will standardize the ML Platform that will be leveraged across Growth Engineering and collaborate with various teams to build and deploy statistical and optimization models that will directly help grow customers, increase wallet share and improve ROAS. Opportunities to leverage Data Science and Machine Learning to make a strong business and financial impact include customer look-alike models, product feed optimization, promotion recommendation, app push personalization, keyword bidding, product & category recommendations, etc. This is an exceptional opportunity to drive Coupang’s growth and create a world where our customers ask, ‘How did I ever live without Coupang?’', 'Preferred:', 'If you need assistance and/or a reasonable accommodation in the application or recruiting process due to a disability, please contact us at\xa0usrecruiting@coupang.com.', 'Coupang is one of the largest and fastest growing e-commerce platforms on the planet. We are on a mission to revolutionize everyday lives for our customers, employees and partners. We solve problems no one has solved before to create a world where people ask, “How did we ever live without Coupang?”', "Lead and execute all Data Science and Machine Learning Initiatives for the organizationEngage with senior leadership, product owner(s) and engineering mangers in\xa0developing and executing data science strategy and roadmapPlay an active role in contributing to company's growth strategy, and identify opportunities to leverage data and insights helping Coupang’s growth and customer loyaltyCollaborate with software engineers and data engineers to implement, verify and deploy models to deliver direct business and financial impactCommunicate clearly and concisely with the team members, peers and leadership teamOver time, assist with hiring and mentoring data scientists and ML engineers in the team", 'Collaborate with software engineers and data engineers to implement, verify and deploy models to deliver direct business and financial impact', 'Engage with senior leadership, product owner(s) and engineering mangers in\xa0developing and executing data science strategy and roadmap', '\xa0', '10+ years of hand-on technical experience in data science working with large data sets to drive significant business/financial impact, preferably in e-commerce', 'Strong sense of ownership, urgency, and drive. High on bias for action', 'Strong fundamentals in object-oriented design, data structures, algorithm, problem solving and complexity analysis', 'Over time, assist with hiring and mentoring data scientists and ML engineers in the team', 'Experience building and productionizing innovative scalable end-to-end machine learning systems', "Play an active role in contributing to company's growth strategy, and identify opportunities to leverage data and insights helping Coupang’s growth and customer loyalty", "Exceptional presentation skills and ability to communicate methodologies, results clearly and concisely to company's top executives", 'Communicate clearly and concisely with the team members, peers and leadership team', 'PhD in Machine Learning, Statistics, Applied Math or a quantitative field10+ years of hand-on technical experience in data science working with large data sets to drive significant business/financial impact, preferably in e-commerceExperience building and productionizing innovative scalable end-to-end machine learning systemsStrong background in statistical modeling and optimization techniquesProficiency in a statistics tool like R and Big Data tools (Hive, Spark, Presto)Strong fundamentals in object-oriented design, data structures, algorithm, problem solving and complexity analysis', 'PhD in Machine Learning, Statistics, Applied Math or a quantitative field', 'In Growth Engineering, our goal is to increase the number of transacting Customers while growing their frequency and lifetime value. We build core platforms and services that power Coupang’s growth. Various platforms under our portfolio include Search Advertising Platform, Affiliate Platform, Display targeting & re-targeting Platform, CRM, Audience Platform, Push Marketing Platform, and other core marketing services for landing, tracking & attribution. We leverage big data, NoSQL, analytics, real-time processing and Machine Learning to build mission-critical and highly scalable services that are reliable 24/7.', 'Qualifications', "Exceptional presentation skills and ability to communicate methodologies, results clearly and concisely to company's top executivesStrong interpersonal skills to work with cross-functional and globally distributed teamsStrong sense of ownership, urgency, and drive. High on bias for action", 'Lead and execute all Data Science and Machine Learning Initiatives for the organization', 'Key Responsibilities:', 'Coupang is an equal opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex or gender (including pregnancy, gender identity, gender expression, sexual orientation, transgender status), national origin, age, disability, medical condition, HIV/AIDS or Hepatitis C status, marital status, military or veteran status, use of a trained dog guide or service animal, political activities, affiliations, citizenship, or any other characteristic or class protected by the laws or regulations in the locations where we operate.', 'Strong background in statistical modeling and optimization techniques', 'Strong interpersonal skills to work with cross-functional and globally distributed teams', '\xa0\xa0', 'Proficiency in a statistics tool like R and Big Data tools (Hive, Spark, Presto)']

['', 'You will design, plan, and resource user research projects', 'Generous vacation policy', 'The HelloSign Design team advocates for our users and our business, setting the vision for our growing family of products. We use data, research, strategy, and empathy to guide multidisciplinary teams toward a common goal, balancing diverse perspectives and empowering our teams to do great work. As we scale globally simplifying life for millions of people, there’s plenty of space for you to grow as part of a team always focused on we, not I, creating delightful products that are worthy of trust.', 'Responsibilities', 'Simplify Work', 'Company Description', 'Prior B2B experience', 'Demonstrated skills for collaborating closely with other researchers, designers, product managers and engineers', "Our Research & Design team crafts delightful experiences that make people's lives easier. We're a close-knit, collaborative group, guided by a highly iterative user-centered design process. Combining research, data, and thoughtful critique, we're discovering needs and solving fundamental problems that impact work and life for millions of people around the world.", 'Experience driving and supporting rapid research in a scrappy environment', 'Clear, compelling presentation and communication style', 'Market competitive total compensation package', 'We laugh a lot', "Our HQ office is located in San Francisco Mission Bay near the UCSF Medical Center and we have a number of team members distributed across the US! Just over 150 employees, we are growing the company deliberately, with a keen eye towards maintaining a culture that values lifestyle, fun and continuous improvement. We were awarded the Hirepalooza Culture Award for Lifestyle in 2015 and the Healthy Mothers Workplace Bronze Award in 2016 and 2017. In 2018, we won SF Business Times' Best Places to Work Award for Small Employers. We continue to maintain an overwhelmingly positive presence on Glassdoor and The Muse.", 'Thank you for your interest in Dropbox careers. We are actively hiring for this position and look forward to reviewing your application. Dropbox is continuing to monitor the COVID-19 pandemic as the health and safety of our community, employees and candidates remain our number one priority. We appreciate your flexibility as we adapt our hiring processes during this evolving situation.Dropbox is the world’s first smart workspace that helps people and teams focus on the work that matters. With more than 600 million registered users across 180 countries, we’re on a mission to design a more enlightened way of working. Dropbox is headquartered in San Francisco, CA, and has 12 offices around the world.', 'Dropbox is an equal opportunity employer. We are a welcoming place for everyone, and we do our best to make sure all people feel supported and connected at work. A big part of that effort is our support for members and allies of internal groups like Asians at Dropbox, BlackDropboxers, Latinx, Pridebox (LGBTQ), Vets at Dropbox, Women at Dropbox, ATX Diversity (based in Austin, Texas) and the Dropbox Empowerment Network (based in Dublin, Ireland).', 'You will identify research needs in partnership with product teams', 'Thank you for your interest in Dropbox careers. We are actively hiring for this position and look forward to reviewing your application. Dropbox is continuing to monitor the COVID-19 pandemic as the health and safety of our community, employees and candidates remain our number one priority. We appreciate your flexibility as we adapt our hiring processes during this evolving situation.', 'You will advocate and guide strategy for design and product direction', "We're always evolving with an eye towards improvement", 'You will adapt research process and practices to the growing needs of the organizationYou will identify research needs in partnership with product teamsYou will design, plan, and resource user research projectsYou will communicate research insights in creative and effective ways among stakeholdersYou will advocate and guide strategy for design and product directionYou will facilitate and shape the design process', 'With a sharp focus on user experience and a lust for innovation, HelloSign is on a mission to Simplify Work.', "We're user-focused and product-drivenWe're always evolving with an eye towards improvementWe're committed to building a product people wantWe thrive on collaboration and learning from each otherWe have a supportive, familial atmosphereWe work in an open, airy, creative spaceWe laugh a lotAnd we'll never forget your birthday!", 'Life at HelloSign:', 'You will adapt research process and practices to the growing needs of the organization', "We're user-focused and product-driven", 'Broad experience with a wide variety of research methods applied across the product development process', 'We believe that the way business gets done today is broken. That’s why we’re dedicated to simplifying work for everyone - from small startups to large enterprise companies. Millions of individuals and over 80,000 companies world-wide trust the HelloSign platform – which includes eSignature, digital workflow and eFax solutions – to automate and manage their most important business transactions.', '100% company paid individual medical, dental, & vision insurance coverage401k + company matchMarket competitive total compensation packageFree Dropbox space for your friends and familyWellness ReimbursementGenerous vacation policy10 company paid holidaysVolunteer time offCompany sponsored tech talks (technology and other relevant professional topics)', 'We have raving fans who love what we make', "We're committed to building a product people want", 'Requirements', 'Company sponsored tech talks (technology and other relevant professional topics)', 'Team Description', 'Role Description', 'Wellness Reimbursement', 'We thrive on collaboration and learning from each other', "And we'll never forget your birthday!", 'We work in an open, airy, creative space', 'Benefits and Perks', '401k + company match', 'This role will work on the  HelloSign deep integration inside Dropbox , a very interesting first-of-its-kind integration. interpret and communicate insights and findings from analysis and experiments to product, service, and business managers ', 'Medidata: Conquering Diseases Together ', ' Bachelors in math, data or related field ', ' Providing technology leadership to a team of engineers  Designing enterprise data models and data-oriented APIs  Leveraging semantic data modeling frameworks like RDF, OWL, and SHACL  Building ETL or analytical pipelines combining multiple streaming data technologies including Kafka, Flink, Spark, S3, ElasticSearch, Hadoop, Serverless or similar  Using a panoply of database technologies, relational and non-relational, including Cassandra, DynamoDB, Athena, Elasticsearch, Redis, various triplestores, and the like  Coding in multiple languages like Python, Java, Scala, SQL, SPARQL in the context of data-oriented problems  Cloud-oriented with strong understanding of SaaS models and cloud services (preferably AWS)  Excellent technical documentation and writing skills  You have a bias towards automation, an Agile/Lean mindset and embrace the Devops culture  Applying machine learning algorithms to large data sets ', ' Designing enterprise data models and data-oriented APIs ', ' Provide technology leadership to a diverse engineering team ', ' Provide technology leadership to a diverse engineering team  Design and program event-driven streaming, batch or micro batch data pipelines to integrate and analyze diverse sources of clinical trial data to generate actionable insights and product enhancements  Design, implement, and document data architecture and data modeling solutions, which include the use of relational, dimensional, NoSQL and NewSQL databases and which support enterprise information management, business intelligence, machine learning, data science, and other business interests  Identify meaningful insights from large data and metadata sources; interpret and communicate insights and findings from analysis and experiments to product, service, and business managers ', ' Leveraging semantic data modeling frameworks like RDF, OWL, and SHACL ', ' Bachelors in math, data or related field  Minimum 5 years of experience working in data engineering and or data science ', ' Cloud-oriented with strong understanding of SaaS models and cloud services (preferably AWS) ', ' Coding in multiple languages like Python, Java, Scala, SQL, SPARQL in the context of data-oriented problems ', ' Building ETL or analytical pipelines combining multiple streaming data technologies including Kafka, Flink, Spark, S3, ElasticSearch, Hadoop, Serverless or similar ']

job_text: ['', 'Job Overview', 'Responsibilities', 'PersuMedia', 'Develop and deploy solutions with PersuMedia Partners for solving business problems using machine (deep) learning and Azure data platforms', 'PhD/MS in Computer Science (CS), Data Science (DS), Mathematics, Statistics, Computational Linguistics, EE, Physics, or other related quantitative fields (preferred)', 'This role will be operating in the Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning (AI & ML) business unit at PersuMedia which delivers to our internal and external customers. Development –\xa0Be a natural mentor to all Practice Consultants promoting an environment of continuous professional development ', 'Use an analytical approach to design, develop and evaluate predictive models and advanced algorithms that lead to optimal value extraction from the data ', 'Other Duties:', 'Experience with analytics and visualization platforms such as Tableau, PowerBI, Domo, Looker, etc.)', 'Experience', 'Our Minneapolis team is seeking a Principal Data Engineer to join our Data & Analytics practices. ', 'Engagement Management:', 'Practice Building –\xa0Assist in the overall growth of the practice area through a combination of business development, talent management, ownership of delivery production and thought leadership Bench and Individual Development –\xa0Be a natural mentor to all Practice Consultants promoting an environment of continuous professional development Business Development –\xa0Lead Practice Business Development activities working with recruiters, Practice Directors and AIM Consultant’s Leadership team ', 'Experience in data architecture, data warehousing including non-relational and relational databases (e.g., SQL, MySQL, Hadoop, MongoDB), big data (Hadoop, MapReduce, Cloudera, HDFS, Hive, PIG, Impala) ', 'Create and present proposals and establish Statements of Work for Client engagements ', 'Practice Development:', 'Elicit clear and actionable client business requirements and develop innovative, compelling solution strategies to meet those requirements ', 'Practice Building –\xa0Assist in the overall growth of the practice area through a combination of business development, talent management, ownership of delivery production and thought leadership ', 'Provide Data Architecture Solutions:\xa0 Solve client data problems by qualifying strategic data requirements, outlining high level integrated designs to meet these requirements and align with enterprise strategy and related business architecture. ', 'Thought Leadership:\xa0Share ideas about the advancement of technology with internal and external communities by speaking at industry leading conferences, performing TED Talks, hosting meet-ups and collaborating brain-storming sessions for open-source projects ', '\xa0 ', 'Build teams and guide consultants through all phases of delivery including: requirements elicitation, solution architecture, and driving an effective development team \xa0 ', 'Experience ', 'Provide Data Architecture Solutions:', 'Day-to-day, you will:', 'Enterprise experience with emerging cloud platforms and development patterns (AWS, Azure, Google, etc.) ', 'Apply knowledge of data modeling, advanced mathematics, machine learning and statistics to recognize patterns, identify opportunities, and present business questions ', 'Successfully manage a portfolio of projects through delegation ', 'Business Development –\xa0Lead Practice Business Development activities working with recruiters, Practice Directors and AIM Consultant’s Leadership team ']

['', '• Conduct multicolor flow cytometry experiments to enable routine and non-routine analysis of cellular products', '• Self-motivated, detail-oriented, and willing to accept temporary responsibilities outside of initial job description', '• Excellent interpersonal, verbal and written communication skills', '• Ability to think critically and demonstrate troubleshooting and problem solving skills', '• Systematically record data and analyze the results of laboratory operations to ensure compliance to appropriate test methods, specifications, and protocols.', 'Associate Scientist I - Analytical Ops', '12 month contract', '• Execute and document cell culture and passaging and banking activities as required', '• Conduct experiments by rigorously implementing approved protocols and following good documentation practices', '• Plan and execute assigned experiments that support routine development activities', '• Experience and aptitude in working in a multidisciplinary laboratory environment with moderate supervision', '• Participate in meetings, present data, provide expertise in areas of responsibility and analyze and prepare data for sharing', '• Ensure that departmental work areas are maintained per 5S guidelines', 'and project goals.', 'The Associate Scientist will be primarily responsible for executing multi parametric flow cytometry based immunophenotyping, analysis of the data and its organization and presentation. The successful candidate will also be responsible for the handling and maintenance of associated materials such as cells and reagents in established and controlled manner to ensure successful outcomes. The successful candidate will execute flow cytometry experiments during analytical method development for QC release and characterization of cell therapy products, maturation of research analytical methodology into development and GMP, and analytical method technology transfer to and from our partners. The Associate Scientist will be responsible to analyze, interpret, and present experimental data, and carefully document resultant information. They will author and review method development reports, test methods and SOPs. The Associate Scientist could work on critical cross-functional projects with the Process Design, Research, Translational Medicine, and/or QC teams to enable manufacturing process, formulation, and drug product development of our therapeutics.', '• Knowledge of mammalian cell culture including primary T cells', '• Experience in cell sorting is a plus', '• Participate in analytical method transfer activities to clinical and commercial QC', 'Description:', '• Knowledge and experience in flow cytometry data analysis using FACSDiva, FlowJo and other relevant softwares', '307185', "• Bachelor's degree in Biology, Immunology, Molecular Biology or related discipline with 8+ years of industry experience, or advanced degree (MS) in relevant discipline with 6+ years of industry experience or Master’s with 4+.", '• Proficient in the use of Microsoft Office, data analysis software (e.g. Prism, JMP) and other applications', '• Support testing as needed to enable process development, innovation and investigations', 'Qualifications', '• Perform flow cytometry based analytical method development and qualification to enable product characterization of autologous T cell therapies', '• Operate and troubleshoot laboratory instrumentation that is used routinely in execution of assays', '• Comfortable in a fast-paced small company environment with minimal direction', '• Experience with multi-color flow cytometry technology and associated instrumentation']

job_text: ['', 'Work with business partners, architects, and other groups to identify technical and functional needs of systems, and determine priority of needs.', 'Responsibilities', 'Location: Remote', 'Basic Qualifications', 'Automate the provisioning of environments.', 'At least 5 years of experience managing software development projects through complete release cycles and working with cross-functional business and technology teams At least 5 years experience with Distributed Computing and Linux\xa0', 'At least 3 years experience with API based services\xa0', 'Job Description:', 'Data Management - Big Data/Machine Learning Engineer - Lead', 'Partner with business systems analysts (BSAs), project managers (PMs), and customers to understand the scope of work, priorities, and requirements for development.', 'We are seeking a Lead Software Engineer with experience solving complex business problems in a fast paced, collaborative, inclusive, and iterative delivery environment. You will lead a team of engineers to help evaluate vendor products.', 'At least 2 years experience with Container environment (ECS)', 'At least 3 years experience in Agile (Jira)\xa0', 'Ensure adherence to defined development life cycle, good software design practices, and Architecture strategy and intent.', 'Troubleshooting problems, involving the appropriate resources and driving resolution of issues with a focus on minimizing impact to our customers.', 'At least 3 years experience with Databases (SQL, RDBMS)\xa0', 'Preferred Qualifications', 'At least 2 years experience with Big Data (Hadoop, EMR) AWS Certified (Associate or Professional)', "Bachelor's Degree", 'At least 3 years experience in people management\xa0', 'At least 5 years experience with Programming (Python or Java)\xa0', 'Developing and enabling continuous integration/continuous deployment (CI/CD) for system components.', 'Work with DevOps leaders to define and align on standard operating procedures and best practices.', 'At least 8 years of software development experience\xa0', 'At least 3 years experience with Cloud Computing (AWS)\xa0', '\xa0\xa0', 'Coordinate coding, testing, implementation and documentation of solutions.\xa0']

The catalog is an evolving collection of product information, data, and metadata for fashion and home products. We are in search of a full-time remote Software Engineer to support and evolve our Catalog System. Essential duties and responsibilities may include, but are not limited to:', 'MS in CS with a focus in systems, machine learning, or information retrieval', 'ShopStyle is the world’s leading fashion aggregator offering 18 million products from more than 1,400 brands and retailers across the globe. ', 'Proficiency in programming computational and statistical algorithms for large data sets. ', 'Daily Responsibilities:', 'Facilitate high research impact through data visualization and novel research communication methods. ', 'Estimated Length:', ':', 'Daily Responsibilities: ', 'Project Overview: ', "As a Quantitative UX Researcher, you combine skills in experimental design, statistical analysis, programming, and human-computer interaction to improve the user experience. As a key member of a product team, you work with stakeholders across functions and levels. You solve challenging problems and empower the team to move forward by developing metrics, measuring results, and integrating new methodologies into existing systems. You do more than just crunch numbers: through reports and team engagement, you provide a UX perspective on quantitative data to help stakeholders understand their users. Coming up with solutions is only one part of your job. Equally important is to identify and quantify problems, and to embark on new research areas worth exploring through innovative methods. You apply principles of rigorous and ethical research to build and improve products that satisfy users' needs and exceed their expectations. ", 'Support product development and design and provide confidence in decision making through thorough quantitative insights. ', 'Drive change by communicating findings to stakeholders in the company. ', ' Desired : ', 'Examine existing data and product designs to generate hypotheses and plans for high-impact research. ', 'Job Title:', ' ', 'Job Title:\xa0UX Researcher ', 'Make research findings convincing and actionable for both research experts and non-experts. ', 'Practical experience in research communication with technical and non-technical audiences. ', 'Mastery of R or Python. ', 'Expertise in statistics and the design of experiments. ', 'Support existing research initiatives, prioritize, and drive research to quantify and improve the advertiser user experience. Make research findings convincing and actionable for both research experts and non-experts. Facilitate high research impact through data visualization and novel research communication methods. ', 'MS or Ph.D. preferred. At least 3 years of relevant work experience with User Experience or Human-Computer Interaction teams. Practical experience in research communication with technical and non-technical audiences. Prior experience of working on enterprise products is a plus. Prior experience of working in the advertising industry is a plus. ', 'Prior experience of working in the advertising industry is a plus. ', 'Required Skills/Qualifications:', 'At least 3 years of relevant work experience with User Experience or Human-Computer Interaction teams. job_title: Senior Research Scientist - Metabolism and Toxicokinetics
job_text: ['', 'Design, conduct, interpret and report results for discovery (non-GLP) and regulatory (GLP) studies in toxicokinetics or ADME (absorption, distribution, metabolism and excretion) to advance the crop protection chemical discovery and registration pipelines.Provide technical leadership and guidance to junior scientific staff.Provide subject matter expertise for the ADME sciences within the Global Human Health Sciences function on discovery and development project teams.Communicate findings to business and scientific audiences, through both oral presentations and written technical reports and manuscripts.', 'Responsibilities', 'Requirements:', 'Description', 'Demonstrated experience and expertise in in vitro and in vivo ADME studies.', 'Experience in working in a GLP (Good Laboratory Practice) environment.', 'Provide technical leadership and guidance to junior scientific staff.', 'Experience working safely with radioactivity, including carbon-14.', 'Communicate findings to business and scientific audiences, through both oral presentations and written technical reports and manuscripts.', 'Benefits', 'Strong written and oral communication skills that allow dissemination of complex technical issues in a clear, concise manner to a variety of scientific and non-scientific audiences.', 'How will you help us grow? It matters to us, and it matters to you!', 'Senior Research Scientist', 'Design, conduct, interpret and report results for discovery (non-GLP) and regulatory (GLP) studies in toxicokinetics or ADME (absorption, distribution, metabolism and excretion) to advance the crop protection chemical discovery and registration pipelines.', 'Ready to grow your perspectives, impact and career? Start by applying to this opportunity today!', 'Qualifications', 'Ph.D. in pharmacokinetics, toxicology or related area with at least three years of relevant experience.', ' Experience in working in a GLP (Good Laboratory Practice) environment. Experience working safely with radioactivity, including carbon-14. Experience using commercial pharmacokinetic and PBPK modeling software (e.g. Phoenix® WinNonlin®, GastroPlus®). ', ' Ph.D. in pharmacokinetics, toxicology or related area with at least three years of relevant experience. Demonstrated experience and expertise in in vitro and in vivo ADME studies. Thorough knowledge and expertise in mammalian metabolism, clearance mechanisms, absorption and toxicokinetics/pharmacokinetics. Demonstrated teamwork and leadership abilities to manage and coordinate multiple projects and chemistries in a timely and effective manner. Strong written and oral communication skills that allow dissemination of complex technical issues in a clear, concise manner to a variety of scientific and non-scientific audiences. ', 'What expertise have you grown? What do you bring to the table?', 'Provide subject matter expertise for the ADME sciences within the Global Human Health Sciences function on discovery and development project teams.', 'Preferences', 'Demonstrated teamwork and leadership abilities to manage and coordinate multiple projects and chemistries in a timely and effective manner.', 'Thorough knowledge and expertise in mammalian metabolism, clearance mechanisms, absorption and toxicokinetics/pharmacokinetics.', 'Experience using commercial pharmacokinetic and PBPK modeling software (e.g. Phoenix® WinNonlin®, GastroPlus®).']

job_title: Associate Research Scientist - Biopharma QC Testing
job_text: ['', ' We have a strong will to win - We earn our customer’s trust - We are gamechangers - We do the right thing - We are one PPD -\u202f', ' Solid understanding and knowledge of general chemistry and separation science ', ' Communicates data and technical issues to the client and responds to client needs and questions. ', ' Proven problem solving and troubleshooting abilities ', ' Prepares study protocols, project status reports, final study reports and other project-related technical documents. ', ' Reviews, interprets, and analyzes data for technical, quality and compliance to protocols, methods, SOPs, client criteria and Good Manufacturing Practices (GMP) or Good Laboratory Practices (GLP). Performs self and peer review of the data for accuracy and compliance with reporting requirements prior to submission to QA and issuance to customers. ', ' Ability to utilize Microsoft Excel and Word to perform tasks ', 'Summarized Purpose', ' Independently performs method validations, method transfers and analytical testing of pharmaceutical and biopharmaceutical compounds in a variety of formulations and/or delivery systems. Understands and conforms to methods and protocols applicable to assigned tasks. Designs and executes experiments with minimal supervision. ', ' Mentors, trains and coordinates laboratory activities of other team members and assists in troubleshooting instrument and analytical problems. ', ' Ability to work in a collaborative work environment with a team ', 'Job Description', '  Solid understanding and knowledge of general chemistry and separation science   Full understanding of laboratory requirements, PPD & client SOPs, ICH guidelines, USP requirements and FDA guidance   Ability to utilize Microsoft Excel and Word to perform tasks   Proficiency on technical operating systems   Proven problem solving and troubleshooting abilities   Effective oral and written communication skills   Proven ability in technical writing skills   Time management and project management skills   Ability to work in a collaborative work environment with a team   Proven problem solving and troubleshooting abilities   Ability to train junior staff  ', ' Effective oral and written communication skills ', ' Proven ability in technical writing skills ', ' Ability to train junior staff ', ' Proficiency on technical operating systems ', ' Time management and project management skills ', ' Assists in designing method validation or method transfer protocols and establish project timelines. ', 'Job Qualification', '  Independently performs method validations, method transfers and analytical testing of pharmaceutical and biopharmaceutical compounds in a variety of formulations and/or delivery systems. Understands and conforms to methods and protocols applicable to assigned tasks. Designs and executes experiments with minimal supervision.   Prepares study protocols, project status reports, final study reports and other project-related technical documents.   Communicates data and technical issues to the client and responds to client needs and questions.   Mentors, trains and coordinates laboratory activities of other team members and assists in troubleshooting instrument and analytical problems.   Assists with quality systems and new equipment.   Assists in designing method validation or method transfer protocols and establish project timelines.   Reviews, interprets, and analyzes data for technical, quality and compliance to protocols, methods, SOPs, client criteria and Good Manufacturing Practices (GMP) or Good Laboratory Practices (GLP). Performs self and peer review of the data for accuracy and compliance with reporting requirements prior to submission to QA and issuance to customers.  ', ' Assists with quality systems and new equipment. ', ' Full understanding of laboratory requirements, PPD & client SOPs, ICH guidelines, USP requirements and FDA guidance ']

['', 'Responsibilities', ' A senior data engineer’s role involves the development of new applications for major projects to drive significant revenue and cost savings for Dun and Bradstreet. Senior data engineers are expected to delve into new, cutting-edge technologies to explore new markets and opportunities.  Senior data engineers are expected to react quickly to high-tech marketplace needs, rapidly developing and deploying new products in an agile work environment to best meet and exceed the expectations of our clients and potential prospects.  Senior data engineers are well respected by the engineering team, and grow the skills and confidence of those around them. ', ' A senior data engineer’s role involves the development of new applications for major projects to drive significant revenue and cost savings for Dun and Bradstreet. Senior data engineers are expected to delve into new, cutting-edge technologies to explore new markets and opportunities. ', 'Bachelor’s degree (preferable in computer science, mathematics, data science, or a related field)Experience with SQL and Linux (3-5 years)Experience with application development (3-5 years), strong preference for candidates with Python experience.Strong collaboration skillsExperience with hosted environments, AWS, Azure, or other cloud service providers preferred', ' Senior data engineers are expected to react quickly to high-tech marketplace needs, rapidly developing and deploying new products in an agile work environment to best meet and exceed the expectations of our clients and potential prospects. ', 'Why We Work at Dun & Bradstreet', 'Experience with hosted environments, AWS, Azure, or other cloud service providers preferred', 'Develop new applications in a variety of programming languages', 'Experience with Snowflake Data Warehouse systems', 'Perform analysis on large datasets to make and implement recommendations for maximizing customer experience', 'Requirements', 'Experience with application development (3-5 years), strong preference for candidates with Python experience.', 'Strong collaboration skills', 'Bachelor’s degree (preferable in computer science, mathematics, data science, or a related field)', 'Develop new applications in a variety of programming languagesTake ownership of existing applications for further development/improvementsWork closely with related groups to ensure business continuityPerform analysis on large datasets to make and implement recommendations for maximizing customer experienceWork as a member of one or more agile teams, using lean principles and SCRUM methodology', ' Senior data engineers are well respected by the engineering team, and grow the skills and confidence of those around them. ', 'Experience with SQL and Linux (3-5 years)', 'Work as a member of one or more agile teams, using lean principles and SCRUM methodology', 'Take ownership of existing applications for further development/improvements', 'Work closely with related groups to ensure business continuity', 'Nice To Have']

', 'Roc is currently looking for a Senior Data Engineer to join one of the premier NYC tech companies located right in the Financial District in Manhattan. ['The Data Science Analytic Translator serves as a primary liaison between data science and asset stakeholders. She/he oversees the development and maintenance of the predictive models and tools within the Data Science portfolio. The Data Science Analytic Translator  resource will monitor the day to day production of the assets using the results as a guide to develop the plan to refresh those assets. She/he will partner with key stakeholders to develop and implement model evolution strategies and requests from customers. Implementation and adoption of the assets is a key success criterion for the position, which requires the development of release plan and resource management ', '', 'Responsibilities', 'Strong combination of communication and problem solving skills with the ability to listen to customer needs and translate into actionable solutions ', 'Build strong partnerships with business customers as a key point of contact ', 'Ability to manage multiple projects concurrently, and to set priorities and plans to meet business goals and objectives ', 'Experience & Skills ', 'Requires fluent skills in the Microsoft suite particularly Excel, Word & PowerPoint. Analysts, Software Engineers, Product Managers/Marketers, Executives and other key stakeholders around the world.\xa0You will have the opportunity to apply your senior-level knowledge, skills and experiences to help build the Data systems and platforms that unleash high-value business insights.\xa0Your efforts will have a direct impact on creating delightfully smart, personalized and revolutionary customer experiences.', 'Qualifications', 'Experience with AWS services including S3, EMR, Kinesis and RDS', "Bachelor's degree in Computer Science required; Master’s degree preferred", 'We are expanding the scope and scale of our global Data team.\xa0To support this growth, we’re searching for a\xa0Senior Big Data\xa0Engineer\xa0to join our team.\xa0', 'Here at LogMeIn, we offer a broad portfolio of SaaS products that unlock the potential of the modern remote, in-office and hybrid workforces. We help people do their best work – whenever, wherever and, however. With millions of users across the globe, our portfolio includes some of the most recognized and popular software products in the world today, (Inc. GoToMeeting, GoToWebinar, LastPass, GoToConnect, etc.).', "Bachelor's degree in Computer Science required; Master’s degree preferred2-5+ years of relevant experience in one or more of the following areas: Big Data Engineering, Data Warehouse, Business Intelligence or Business Analytics2+ years of hands-on experience in writing complex, highly optimized SQL queries across large data setsDemonstrated strength in Data Modelling, ETL Development, and Data WarehousingExperience with AWS services including S3, EMR, Kinesis and RDSExperience with Big Data stack of technologies, including Hadoop, HDFS, Hive, Spark, Pig, PrestoKnowledge of distributed systems as they pertain to data storage and computingExceptional problem solving and analytical skillsKnowledge of software engineering best practices across the development lifecycle; including, Agile methodologies, coding standards, code reviews, source management, build processes, testing, and operations", '2+ years of hands-on experience in writing complex, highly optimized SQL queries across large data sets', 'Partner with our Active Insights team to build an offline feature set for Data Analysis and Machine Learning model training', 'Interface with other technology teams to extract, transform, and load data from a wide variety of data sources', 'Ensure completeness and compatibility of the technical infrastructure required to support system performance, availability and architecture requirements']

['', "If this sounds like an opportunity you'd like to hear more on, please send your updated resume to me at kendaeubanks@optomi.com.\xa0 ", '*Must be a US Citizen, Green Card Holder (or do not require sponsorship) as this position is 6 months Contract to Hire*\xa0', "Our client in Atlanta, GA is seeking\xa0an API Analytics Developer for an exciting new project working with restaurant efficiency! They are looking for experience in API Development - building Restful API's and writing actual applications. This position is more like a developer with Machine Learning (not just looking for a Data Scientist/Engineer with Python and Machine Learning). Must have experience with API builds and integrations. Need experience with Python, node.js, GoLang, Django, Pandas, Lambdas, etc. The project is building out high performance systems, with LARGE amounts of data in real time capacity. The client is still remote until there is a vaccine for COVID-19.\xa0 ", ' ', 'The client is still remote until there is a vaccine for COVID-19.\xa0']

job_title: Clinical Laboratory Scientist - M-F AM shift
job_text: ['', 'BS/BA in chemical, physical, biological or clinical laboratory', 'Requires CA CLS Generalist license', 'Good understanding of statistical methods and application to the analysis of complex assays', 'Actively follows standard operating procedures to ensure compliance with quality test reporting', 'Responsibilities:', '\xa0', 'Laboratory training/experience in specialties related to molecular biology, virology, and/or tissue culture highly preferred ', 'Works effectively with a group or independently to ensure timely result reporting to clients', '\xa0Requirements: ', 'BS/BA in chemical, physical, biological or clinical laboratoryRequires CA CLS Generalist licenseLaboratory training/experience in specialties related to molecular biology, virology, and/or tissue culture highly preferred Good understanding of statistical methods and application to the analysis of complex assaysDemonstrated proficiency in computer skills and experience with laboratory information systemsColor vision-ability to distinguish and identify different colorsStrong verbal and written communication skills are necessaryAbility to work with a high attention to detail in a collaborative and flexible environment', 'Demonstrated proficiency in computer skills and experience with laboratory information systems', "Monogram is seeking a Clinical Laboratory Scientist to join its clinical laboratory in the Data Analysis group. The Clinical Laboratory Scientist will perform analysis and review of phenotypic and genotypic drug resistance tests using Monogram in-house created analysis systems. Drug resistance testing allows clinicians to evaluate a patient's viral resistance profile with confidence by showing which drugs for which the viral resistance profile is susceptible, partially sensitive, or resistant. ", 'Color vision-ability to distinguish and identify different colors', "Utilizes Monogram's in-house data analysis systems to perform comprehensive review of phenotypic and genotypic testing based on established criteriaCompletes associated batch records which denotes data analysis findingsReviews sample status in laboratory information system and accurately enters repeat or reporting resultsActively follows standard operating procedures to ensure compliance with quality test reportingRecognizes problems and initiates appropriate corrective actionWorks effectively with a group or independently to ensure timely result reporting to clientsRemains flexible and focused as business priorities change", 'Reviews sample status in laboratory information system and accurately enters repeat or reporting results', 'Ability to work with a high attention to detail in a collaborative and flexible environment', 'The schedule for this position will be Monday - Friday, AM Shift (6am start time, and may eventually transition to 8am start time) ', 'Completes associated batch records which denotes data analysis findings', "Utilizes Monogram's in-house data analysis systems to perform comprehensive review of phenotypic and genotypic testing based on established criteria", 'Strong verbal and written communication skills are necessary', 'Recognizes problems and initiates appropriate corrective action', 'Remains flexible and focused as business priorities change']

['', 'We are seeking a talented, highly motivated Bioinformatics Research Scientist to lead next-generation sequencing (NGS) studies focused on molecular heterogeneity underlying the pathogenesis of childhood brain tumors. The Northcott Lab is internationally renowned for its expertise in the genomic analysis of medulloblastoma, with a strong track record substantiated by consistent publications in top tier journals such as Nature, Cancer Cell, Lancet Oncology, Journal of Clinical Oncology, and more. In this position, the candidate will lead cutting-edge computational analyses of multi-omic datasets derived from large medulloblastoma patient cohorts. The candidate will also work closely with other lab personnel and be an integral part of exciting collaborations both within St. Jude and with other world-class labs across the globe. These efforts will involve highly integrative studies consisting of comprehensive NGS datasets, including the analysis of WGS/WES, RNA-seq, DNA methylation, ChIP-seq, ATAC-seq, and single-cell genomics data. A deep understanding of cancer genomics, genetics or epigenetics, strong problem-solving skills, attention to detail, critical thinking, and expertise in NGS data analysis are required for this position. ', 'Journal of Clinical Oncology', 'The successful recruit must have experience in NGS data analysis and the capacity to execute proficient computational analyses and troubleshooting independently, communicate effectively with the PI and collaborators, and thrive in a highly collaborative team environment.\xa0Proficiency in a programming language such as Python and/or R is preferred along with familiarity with the Linux command line.\xa0Candidates with publications in reputable journals as evidence for the strength and quality of their scientific training will be deemed highly competitive.', 'Ph.D. in Molecular Biology, Biochemistry, Computer Science, Statistics, Mathematics, Bioinformatics, or related field required.', 'Requirements', 'Ph.D. which must include research related to bioinformatics (such as analysis of sequence data, microarrays, SNPs, image data, proteomics data, or biological pathways; development of algorithms, statistical methods, or scientific software); OR If Ph.D. with no bioinformatics research, then two (2) years of pre-or postdoctoral experience in Computational Biology or Bioinformatics research is required.', 'Benefits', 'Ph.D. in Molecular Biology, Biochemistry, Computer Science, Statistics, Mathematics, Bioinformatics, or related field required.Ph.D. which must include research related to bioinformatics (such as analysis of sequence data, microarrays, SNPs, image data, proteomics data, or biological pathways; development of algorithms, statistical methods, or scientific software); OR If Ph.D. with no bioinformatics research, then two (2) years of pre-or postdoctoral experience in Computational Biology or Bioinformatics research is required.Experience with programming languages such as Perl, C, or Java required.', 'Experience with programming languages such as Perl, C, or Java required.', 'Nature, Cancer Cell,', 'Salary is highly competitive (comparable to industry) and\xa0employee benefits are outstanding. Relocation assistance is available. Working at St. Jude provides the opportunity to make a tangible difference to pediatric cancer patient care and survival and St. Jude has been consistently ranked in Fortune magazine’s “100 Best Places to Work” list and is exceptionally positively reviewed on GlassDoor.', 'Lancet Oncology', '.', '\xa0', 'St. Jude is an Equal Opportunity Employer']

['', 'Strong knowledge of and experience with databases (SQL, etc.) and strong programming knowledge (Python, etc.).', 'Implement deep or reinforcement learning for time series analysis forecasting', 'Work with long term discretionary PMs to codify their investment heuristics and signals', 'Strong knowledge of and experience with databases (SQL, etc.) and strong programming knowledge (Python, etc.).Currently pursuing a MS in Data Science, ML, Mathematics, Economics, Computer Science, Information Management, or Statistics\xa0', 'Source for alternative data sources that are relevant for investment signals and explanatory data analysis', 'Must Haves:', 'Kepler Fi is the independent, radical innovation arm of one of the worlds largest sovereign wealth funds, focused on moonshots within institutional asset management. We perform strategic investments, joint ventures, and internal development of ambitious ideas to transform the asset management space.', 'For 2020 Fall, we are looking for a Quant Research Intern to work in a fast-paced startup-like environment assist in sourcing, creating, and analyzing data for a systematic long-term fundamental investing equities investment platform.', 'Source for alternative data sources that are relevant for investment signals and explanatory data analysisWork with long term discretionary PMs to codify their investment heuristics and signalsInterpret data, analyze results using statistical, machine learning and data mining techniques, and provide ongoing reportsWrite pipelines to convert raw data into aggregated data that can be used as signalsImplement deep or reinforcement learning for time series analysis forecastingFilter and “clean” data by reviewing computer reports, printouts, and performance indicators to locate and correct code problems', 'Write pipelines to convert raw data into aggregated data that can be used as signals', 'Responsibilities:', 'Filter and “clean” data by reviewing computer reports, printouts, and performance indicators to locate and correct code problems', 'Currently pursuing a MS in Data Science, ML, Mathematics, Economics, Computer Science, Information Management, or Statistics\xa0', '\ufeff', '\xa0', 'Interpret data, analyze results using statistical, machine learning and data mining techniques, and provide ongoing reports']

['', 'Location:', 'Set project standards and monitor progress', 'Ability to mentor and develop staff members; management experience a plus.', 'PhD in a social science or public administration subject, with coursework in organizational behavior or statistics and data analysis3-5 years of experience in an academic or non-academic research setting; a focus on relevant topics a strong plusDemonstrated applied research skills, with excellent methodological and analytic capabilitiesExemplary statistical analysis skills, with experience in Stata or SPSSCreative problem-solving skillsAbility to tell a compelling story by synthesizing quantitative and qualitative insightsStrong public speaking skillsCommitment to quality, objectivity, and integrityExcellent verbal and written communication skillsDetail-oriented, especially around data and how it is presentedAbility to mentor and develop staff members; management experience a plus.Strong organizational and time management skills; ability to balance multiple work streamsAbility to work both independently and effectively as a team playerSuperb Word, Excel, and PowerPoint skillsExperience working with corporate clients a plusHigh energy and passion for CTI’s mission is essential', 'The Role', 'Requirements:', 'Commitment to quality, objectivity, and integrity', 'A community of business experts and leaders at leading global companies – our Task Force of member companiesGround-breaking research and publications on the most important issues in diversity and inclusionAdvisory services that drive change through the implementation of our research', 'Please email cover letter, resume, and research writing sample to: apply@centerfortalentinnovation.recruitee.com', 'The Center for Talent Innovation (CTI) is a New York based think tank that conducts research, builds community, and advises companies to design diverse, inclusive workplaces where every person belongs. CTI currently works with 100+ companies – many in the Fortune 500 – and is organized along three pillars:', 'Contribute strongly to CTI’s research projects, from idea generation to publicationGenerate discussions regarding the development and implementation of research strategies Set project standards and monitor progressCommunicate interim and final research findings in a clear, concise, and actionable manner to senior corporate stakeholdersDesign questionnaires for interviews, focus groups, and surveysConduct focus groups and interviewsManage analysis of quantitative and qualitative findings and maintain data integrityEnsure research findings are rigorously fact-checked against CTI data and external dataCreate clear, informative reports for clientsManage and develop a teamOther responsibilities as needed', 'Contribute strongly to CTI’s research projects, from idea generation to publication', 'Salary:', 'Superb Word, Excel, and PowerPoint skills', 'Strong public speaking skills', 'The Center for Talent Innovation wishes to attract the best talent to ensure we are delivering on our mission. We believe that diversity and inclusion are critical to our success. To meet this goal, we must have a workplace where differences are appreciated and respected. We are committed to providing an environment of mutual respect where equal employment opportunities are available to all applicants and teammates without regard to race, color, religion, sex, age, physical and mental disability, national origin, pregnancy, marital status, sexual orientation, gender identity, gender expression, genetic information, military and veteran status, and any other characteristic protected by applicable law.', 'PhD in a social science or public administration subject, with coursework in organizational behavior or statistics and data analysis', 'Other responsibilities as needed', 'The Senior Researcher, a VP level position, supports the center’s research on diversity, equity, and inclusion taking on a lead role with the support of a team in overseeing quantitative and qualitative analysis using a range of tools and rigorous methods to acquire information and interpret data, and presenting findings. Higher-level leadership is needed for this role and experience managing a team is a must. The ideal candidate will have demonstrated success in social or organizational research management, design, analysis, and interpretation, as well as awareness and interest in emerging issues of diversity and inclusion. ', 'Communicate interim and final research findings in a clear, concise, and actionable manner to senior corporate stakeholders', 'Ability to tell a compelling story by synthesizing quantitative and qualitative insights', 'Detail-oriented, especially around data and how it is presented', 'Create clear, informative reports for clients', 'Ground-breaking research and publications on the most important issues in diversity and inclusion', 'This position is located in our large, bright office in midtown, though CTI aims to be flexible regarding work- from-home considerations. CTI is nonprofit, nonpartisan, and committed to the integrity of our research.', 'Applications will be processed on a rolling basis. Only those whose application is being considered will be contacted. No phone calls or emails, please.', 'Conduct focus groups and interviews', 'Manage analysis of quantitative and qualitative findings and maintain data integrity', 'Design questionnaires for interviews, focus groups, and surveys', 'Ensure research findings are rigorously fact-checked against CTI data and external data', 'The Senior Researcher’s contributions will include overseeing in-depth literature reviews; assessing new methodologies and future applications of methodologies; and participating in the development and completion of research projects. This is an opportunity for a sharp, visionary thinker to delve into urgent workplace diversity issues and uncover transformative solutions. This position will report to an EVP.', 'Responsibilities include:', 'Generate discussions regarding the development and implementation of research strategies ', 'Experience working with corporate clients a plus', 'Ability to work both independently and effectively as a team player', 'How to Apply', 'High energy and passion for CTI’s mission is essential', '3-5 years of experience in an academic or non-academic research setting; a focus on relevant topics a strong plus', 'apply@centerfortalentinnovation.recruitee.com', 'Creative problem-solving skills', 'Advisory services that drive change through the implementation of our research', 'A community of business experts and leaders at leading global companies – our Task Force of member companies', 'Salary: Competitive salary commensurate with experience. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, disability or veteran status.', 'The Senior Risk Adjustment Data Engineer position supports, compiles and reports key information created, enhances and maintains for regulatory submissions, reporting, budget or financial models, or benchmarks for an Affordable Care Act or Medicare Risk Adjustment as prescribed by Center for Medicare and  Medicaid Services, Department of  Health, Health and Human Services or other State and Federal Regulatory Agencies. This position will function in conducting and manage outcome of various data points that may include, analyzing, reviewing, forecasting, and trending of data to support health plan Risk Adjustment Financial Strategy.  The position will contribute to the development of business requirements, functional requirements, solution design, process flow and other related documentation for supporting the Regulatory Submissions.  The position will take ownership of business processes and develop procedures to mitigate audit risks.  The Senior Risk Adjustment Data Engineer position will ensure that the appropriate development standards are met. ', 'Develop Analytical Modeling to value the claims accepted versus claims rejected / outstanding. ', 'Some travel locally between locations is required ', 'Enable Risk Adjustment Program Analytics by developing a data reconciliation model that compares submitted claims and return files to drive RAF improvement. Correlate the differences in Risk Scores to Claims Acceptance Rate and empower the Encounter Data Submissions team to drive towards the desired outcomes. Enable the Operational processes to address and resolve the rejected claims in a timely manner. Develop Analytical Modeling to value the claims accepted versus claims rejected / outstanding. Develop discipline around data management and data integrity to mitigate data (member diagnosis) leakage. Develop processes to ingest the return files from the regulatory agencies for different lines of business. Contribute to the development of business requirements, functional requirements, solution design, process flow and other related documentation for supporting the Regulatory Submissions. Develop the Financial Accrual Model and Risk Transfer Model to correlate Member Comorbidity with Premium. Support strategies for effective monitoring and auditing to identify risks, improve quality and reduce risk stemming from CMS RADV audits. Assume ownership of business processes and develop procedures to mitigate audit risks. Develop and implement programs that will enhance provider training and education of the HCC Risk Adjustment Process, Proper Medical Record Documentation and Diagnosis Accuracy. Drive towards the integration of prospective programs into care management processes and promote the use of risk adjustment programs to help facilitate care management. Provides guidance to junior-level analysts on data management, data analysis techniques, communication with non-technical stakeholders, project management, and healthcare industry knowledge. But even when we fail, we advance medical science and understanding by learning more about diseases, biology and chemistry – ultimately bringing new solutions one step closer to reality. ', 'Lilly Imaging Research and Development/Avid Radiopharmaceuticals provides technical expertise for molecular imaging to Lilly Research Laboratories. job_title: Field Application Scientist, Genedata Selector, USA-Boston
job_text: ['', 'Our collective expertise in research informatics, combined with our open and scalable computational solutions, makes us the leading software provider in discovery informatics for biotech, pharmaceuticals, and related life sciences.', 'If you are interested in this position, please submit us your CV and motivation letter.', 'As a Field Application Scientist for the Genedata Selector platform, you will work with our scientific team to support customer projects, answer technical questions, and find creative approaches to genomic-scale problems.\xa0You will work in a variety of diverse application areas including comparative genomics, metagenomics, biosafety, short read sequence, and statistical analysis of quantitative data.\xa0You will also act as an interface between science and sales, working closely with external customers and internal sales and software engineering teams.', 'Identify customer needs, and map them to the capabilities of the software', 'Proficient working in a UNIX environment and with using a scripting or programming language (e.g. Perl, Python, Java)', '\xa0', 'Define appropriate service projects with customers to fulfill unmet needs', 'Experience in analyzing next generation sequencing data (RNA-seq, DNA-seq, metagenomics, etc.)', 'Genedata’s success in providing computational solutions for bio-pharmaceutical R&D depends on its people from all over the world: innovative data scientists, talented soft-ware engineers, strategic marketing thinkers, communicative business developers plus any others with unique skills that make a difference in a highly innovative environment.', 'What is next?', 'Internet-based and on-site product training sessions with customers', 'If you would like the next step in your career to be supporting the frontier of science and technology with cutting-edge software, Genedata has just the right opportunity for you!', 'Scientific consulting and professional service activities for customer projects, working with customer’s cross functional partners including scientific and IT partnersIdentify customer needs, and map them to the capabilities of the softwareTroubleshoot scientific and technical support issues and capture user feedbackCommunicate customer needs and coordinate activities internally with the scientific consulting and professional services team, business account managers and product managersSupport our sales team with product expertise, scientific presentations, and software demonstrationsPresent the product vision of Genedata Selector to prospects and customersInternet-based and on-site product training sessions with customersIdentify new business opportunities with business account managersDefine appropriate service projects with customers to fulfill unmet needs', 'The Position', 'Genedata only accepts CVs and resumes directly from candidates. Personnel recruitment agencies need not respond.', 'What can you expect from us?', 'Present the product vision of Genedata Selector to prospects and customers', 'Support our sales team with product expertise, scientific presentations, and software demonstrations', 'The successful candidate has:', '3 years’ experience working in a biopharma, industrial biotech, agribusiness or related life sciences environment using standard bioinformatics tools and databases', 'Genedata is an Equal Opportunity Employer.', 'Identify new business opportunities with business account managers', 'MS or PhD in biology, microbiology, bioinformatics, or similar discipline', 'Related statistical analysis experience', 'Troubleshoot scientific and technical support issues and capture user feedback', 'Are you a scientist or computational biologist with an interest in analyzing and interpreting ‘omics datasets and genome/proteome sequences?\xa0Does the idea of working in partnership with the world’s leading agribusiness, industrial biotechnology, and pharmaceutical companies to solve big data challenges sound exciting to you? \xa0If so, we would like to talk with you as we seek to grow our ['The successful candidate will have strong background in microfluidics, device fabrication, chemistry or medicine, and also a strong interest to pursue translational research geared towards application. Postdoctoral candidates should have PhD degree with biology or chemistry or engineering training, or MD degree with research training. Prior experience in the field of diagnostics is a plus but not required. Must be a self-driven individual with innovative and independent thinking. Must be organized and detail-oriented. Must have excellent writing and communication skills.', 'We are seeking highly-driven and innovative-thinking candidates at the level of Postdoctoral Researcher with microfluidics expertise to join a cutting-edge translational research team. The research focus of the lab is to develop novel diagnostic technologies, with the aim of translating bench technologies to clinical applications, including but not limited to point-of-care, medical sensors and wearables.  The research team will work at the intersection between engineering, nanotechnology, clinical diagnostics and medicine, with the unique opportunity to quickly test research products with clinical samples and pilot in the end-user environment.', 'Postdoctoral Researcher', '\xa0']

company: Harvard Medical School and Massachusetts General Hospital
job_text: ['', '1. Exceptional candidates will have a Ph.D. degree with expertise in Optical Science, Photonics, Optical instrumentation or other relevant technical disciplines.', 'Post-doctoral Research positions in Optical diagnostics and imaging ', '2. Multiple positions are available for candidates with demonstrated excellence in one or more of the following areas: Optics and Photonics, Optical system design and Instrumentation, and optical biosensor technologies.', '4. A keen interest in innovating medical technologies for clinical translation and commercialization.', 'Massachusetts General Hospital, Harvard Medical School, Boston, MA USA', 'Requirements:', ' ', 'Wellman Center for Photomedicine, Massachusetts General Hospital, Harvard Medical School, Boston, MA USA', 'At the Laboratory for Optical Micromechanics and Imaging our mission is to innovate, develop and translate light-based technologies to address major clinical and biomedical problems in hematology, atherosclerosis and cancer research. Candidates with strong backgrounds in Optics, Photonics and Optical Engineering other relevant disciplines are sought to join leading efforts in the development and application of new technologies including laser speckle rheology, optical coherence tomography, birefringence microscopy, point-of-care optical diagnostics, miniature endoscopy and invitro optical diagnostic devices. For more information about our research please visit: http://nadkarnilab.mgh.harvard.edu', '5. An entrepreneurial mindset is highly desirable.', 'To apply:', 'The Laboratory for Optical Micromechanics and Imaging at the Wellman Center for Photomedicine is seeking highly motivated PhD scientists to fill open postdoctoral positions in optical diagnostics and optical imaging. Our laboratory is located at Massachusetts General Hospital and Harvard Medical School. The Wellman Center is the world’s largest academic research facility dedicated to the development of light-mediated, diagnostic and therapeutic technologies.', 'Wellman Center for Photomedicine', '3. Advanced programming skills in Matlab, LabView and/or C++ are required.', 'To apply: Interested candidates are invited to send a detailed CV (including a list of publications), a cover letter describing training and research experience, and names and contact information of three referees to Dr. Seemantini Nadkarni via email at snadkarni@mgh.harvard.edu with the subject line: Postdoctoral fellowship application 2020', 'Laboratory for Optical Micromechanics and Imaging']
