job_title: Assoc Director, Translational Medicine Team Leader
job_text: ['', 'Formal education or significant experience in immunology', 'Knowledge in biomarker-driven clinical studies in respiratory, oncology, and/or immunology is a plus', 'Ability to recognize, articulate, and accept calculated risks to make informed decisions', 'Requirements:', 'Accountable for Interpretation, analysis and communication / publication of biomarker data to', 'Demonstrated scientific acumen and mechanistic understanding of disease biology', 'Clear understanding of the role of clinical biomarkers in drug development.', 'Responsibilities:', 'Scientist who will provide leadership across the therapeutic and functional areas and will be an internal subject matter expert for clinical immunology/immune-oncology.Responsible for developing and executing translational Medicine strategies for the early stage pipeline and ensure an\xa0integrated (consistent) approach for each development program, from\xa0FIH through registration, and across indications.Accountable for deliverables in a Matrixed management team, in close collaboration with clinical development, operations and the research organizations for the design, set-up, execution, and analysis and reporting of clinical Biomarkers studies.Plan analysis plans for clinical Biomarker studiesPlan BudgetAccountable for Interpretation, analysis and communication / publication of biomarker data toA technical/scientific expert to define, revise and progress biomarker plans.Effectively engages with teams and governance bodies and will effectively interfaces with the Translational Medicine group to obtain appropriate resources to deliver.As appropriate, provides biomarker expertise to progress validated biomarkers into development of Diagnostics tools.', 'MD, PhD, or PharmD, Experienced scientist with 2-7 years’ experience in the drug development process.Formal education or significant experience in immunologyExperience in the appropriate application of various scientific technologies into translational research strategies is a plusKnowledge in biomarker-driven clinical studies in respiratory, oncology, and/or immunology is a plusDemonstrated ability to lead others through change by navigating ambiguity, creating the context, and engaging individuals.Cross functional leadership/ projects including demonstrated ability to delegate key projects appropriatelyClear understanding of the role of clinical biomarkers in drug development.Excellent communication skills across all levels within an organization and external.Demonstrated scientific acumen and mechanistic understanding of disease biologyComfortable working in a fast-paced environment where speed is paramountAbility to recognize, articulate, and accept calculated risks to make informed decisions', 'MD, PhD, or PharmD, Experienced scientist with 2-7 years’ experience in the drug development process.', 'Gossamer Bio is seeking a Translational Medicine Team Leader who will be responsible for developing and executing translational strategies for assets in early stage development for the Gossamer Bio pipeline. The TMTL is be a key interface within the Translational Medicine team, and provide an overall accountability for TM strategy and activities.\xa0', 'Effectively engages with teams and governance bodies and will effectively interfaces with the Translational Medicine group to obtain appropriate resources to deliver.', 'Excellent communication skills across all levels within an organization and external.', 'Summary:', 'Comfortable working in a fast-paced environment where speed is paramount', 'Demonstrated ability to lead others through change by navigating ambiguity, creating the context, and engaging individuals.', 'Responsible for developing and executing translational Medicine strategies for the early stage pipeline and ensure an\xa0integrated (consistent) approach for each development program, from\xa0FIH through registration, and across indications.', 'Cross functional leadership/ projects including demonstrated ability to delegate key projects appropriately', 'Accountable for deliverables in a Matrixed management team, in close collaboration with clinical development, operations and the research organizations for the design, set-up, execution, and analysis and reporting of clinical Biomarkers studies.', 'Gossamer Bio is a clinical-stage biopharmaceutical company focused on discovering, acquiring, developing and commercializing therapeutics in the disease areas of immunology, inflammation and oncology. Our goal is to create a business that allows value creation and capture at the individual asset level, long-term sustainability, and continuity, while ultimately helping to improve the lives of patients.', 'Plan Budget', 'Plan analysis plans for clinical Biomarker studies', 'A technical/scientific expert to define, revise and progress biomarker plans.', 'Scientist who will provide leadership across the therapeutic and functional areas and will be an internal subject matter expert for clinical immunology/immune-oncology.', 'Experience in the appropriate application of various scientific technologies into translational research strategies is a plus', 'Gossamer Bio is committed to equal opportunity in the terms and conditions of employment for all employees and job applicants and complies with all applicable national, state and local laws governing nondiscrimination in employment.', 'As appropriate, provides biomarker expertise to progress validated biomarkers into development of Diagnostics tools.']

['', 'As a key member of a cutting-edge machine learning driven tech start-up, we are looking for an individual who will own the concepts and become expert in this new space and contribute creative strategic ideas back into our business and technical teams.\xa0', 'Support sales teams efforts by leading pre-sales efforts related to hospital IT intake and project planning ', 'Co-Founder, Director & Chief Technology Officer', 'Dr Michael Sughrue | ', 'Stephen headed up Facebook’s #5 market (ANZ), and was a pivotal figure in scaling Facebook from start up to US$500+ billion giant.\xa0Stephen brings the commercial software business leadership to execute our vision', 'The position will require development of both a high level or technical expertise in MRI and Hospital IT to facilitate new site deployment and clinical expertise in the new field of connectomics. ', 'SENIOR TEAM', 'ROLE', 'Manage multiple pre-sales and implementation projects remotely while also providing troubleshooting and customer support as needed ', 'CEO & Managing Director', 'Must be able to travel throughout the US and Canada, sometimes with short notice ', 'PRODUCT', 'Remuneration would be based on market and candidate experience. The role involves a very attractive Employee Share Option Plan.', 'Knowledge of medical imaging workflow and DICOM file exchange; knowledge of MRI and brain imaging is preferred', 'Strong interpersonal and presentation skills, along with the ability to communicate effectively with customers and others at all levels of the organization', 'RESPONSIBILITIES', 'Mike built one of the biggest neurosurgery practices in the US.\xa0With over 230 articles published in scientific journals and as a world authority in the field of Connectomics, Mike brings an unrivalled understanding of the brain to the business of practical clinical outcomes ', 'Must be able to establish a professional working environment without access to a corporate office', 'Occasionally travel (approximately 20%) to customer sites across the US and Canada, sometimes with short notice', 'Stephen Scheeler | CEO & Managing Director', 'Lead technical deployment of software at customer sites, including project managing software deployment, MRI configuration, technical training', 'Act as primary technical applications support for our initial product launch in the field of connectomics', 'Strong aptitude for troubleshooting and investigation of customer technical issues ', 'Prior experience supporting technical implementations of software within the hospital network, including interacting with hospital IT and/or PACS administrators', 'Omniscient seeks an experienced and qualified Technical Applications Specialist – US to facilitate implementation of our cloud-based neuroimaging informatics software. ', 'Prior experience supporting technical implementations of software within the hospital network, including interacting with hospital IT and/or PACS administratorsKnowledge of medical imaging workflow and DICOM file exchange; knowledge of MRI and brain imaging is preferredStrong interpersonal and presentation skills with the ability to communicate effectively with a variety of stakeholders at customer sites Strong aptitude for troubleshooting and investigation of customer technical issues Must be able to travel throughout the US and Canada, sometimes with short notice Strong interpersonal and presentation skills, along with the ability to communicate effectively with customers and others at all levels of the organizationSelf-starter able to work independently with little or no supervisionMaster’s degree is desired in a technical or clinical field, Bachelor’s degree is required', 'Act as primary technical applications support for our initial product launch in the field of connectomicsLead technical deployment of software at customer sites, including project managing software deployment, MRI configuration, technical trainingSupport sales teams efforts by leading pre-sales efforts related to hospital IT intake and project planning Work with hospital radiology (MRI) departments to implement and optimize MRI acquisitions for use with our softwareManage multiple pre-sales and implementation projects remotely while also providing troubleshooting and customer support as needed Assist the clinical applications team with clinical training and use of the software as neededMust be able to establish a professional working environment without access to a corporate officeOccasionally travel (approximately 20%) to customer sites across the US and Canada, sometimes with short notice', 'We are looking for a technically savvy individual to join our team and help crack open the North American market. The ideal individual would be highly motivated by working with global thought-leaders in cloud-based medical informatics software and using that expertise to drive success with new and potential customers. Our products are different than what is out there today; some experience in machine learning or advanced medical imaging would be a plus, but most important is a desire and aptitude to become an expert in the space. ', 'Dr Stephane Doyen | ', 'Connectomics,', 'Stephen Scheeler | ', 'Dr Michael Sughrue | Co-Founder, Director & Chief Medical Officer', 'KEY REQUIREMENTS', 'Clinical decision support software that takes a rsfMRI brain image, loaded via a web browser that de-identifies on-site, to the Cloud where, through 23 machine-learning steps, we return a functional map and detect anomalies of the patient’s brain in one hour.\xa0This allows neurosurgeons, neurologists, psychologists and psychiatrists to make more accurate diagnosis and personalised treatment plans for all brain-related disorders.', 'VISION', 'Dr Stephane Doyen | Co-Founder, Director & Chief Technology Officer', 'This is a fully remote position reporting to Brad Fernald, VP North America.', 'As the Head Data Scientist with top-tier consultants, Oliver Wyman, combined with a PhD in neuroscience from Cambridge, Stephane is the ideal technical leader to develop our brain/machine-learning software', 'To enable the world’s doctors to treat the brain health of billions through personalised clinical decision support software', 'Co-Founder, Director & Chief Medical Officer', 'Master’s degree is desired in a technical or clinical field, Bachelor’s degree is required', 'Work with hospital radiology (MRI) departments to implement and optimize MRI acquisitions for use with our software', 'Strong interpersonal and presentation skills with the ability to communicate effectively with a variety of stakeholders at customer sites ', 'Self-starter able to work independently with little or no supervision', 'Assist the clinical applications team with clinical training and use of the software as needed', 'The work will be primarily remote, supporting pre-sales activities, creating implementation plans, project managing implementations, and troubleshooting. Additionally the role will support our clinical team with some travel to customer sites to support the point of use of the software in the hospital setting, including but not limited to radiological imaging in MRI, neurological testing in clinic, and surgical intervention in the operating room. ']

Python.4+ years of hands-on experience in working with numpy, scipy, scikit-learn, pandas.4+ years industry experience shipping production machine learning models.Experience communicating projects to variance, convex optimization, eigenvectors, relational databases, SQL, latency, computational complexity, sparse matrices.', 'Preferred Qualifications:', 'Solving problems from ideation to production, using machine learning.', 'Exploratory data analyses and investigations.', '4+ years of hands-on experience in working with numpy, scipy, scikit-learn, pandas.', 'You will have an opportunity to work on a small and growing team based in San Francisco in an environment where engineering is central to what we do. The products we build are breaking new ground, and we have a focus on providing the best environment to allow you to do what you do best - solve problems, collaborate with your team and push first class software. We promote an open diverse environment, encourage contributions to open-source software and invest heavily in our staff. Our team is talented, capable and inclusive. We know that great things can only be done with great teams and look forward to building and working with great people.', 'Publications in top conferences.', 'You’re a deeply curious person.', 'Strong theoretical foundations in linear algebra, probability theory, optimization.', 'Experimenting, training, tuning, and shipping machine learning models.', 'You’re comfortable with investigating open-ended problems and coming up with concrete approaches to solve them.You know when to use machine learning and when not to!You’re a deeply curious person.You can wrangle data like a pro alligator wrestler and come out relatively unscathed.You often think about applications of machine learning in your personal life.', 'Basic Qualifications:\xa0\xa0', 'You know what these things are (in no particular order): logistic regression, gradient descent, regularization, cross-validation, overfitting, bias, variance, convex optimization, eigenvectors, relational databases, SQL, latency, computational complexity, sparse matrices.', 'PhD in Computer Science, Electrical Engineering, Statistics, Physics, or similar quantitative fields.Publications in top conferences.Experience writing complex SQL queries.You have deep experience with these things: logistic regression, gradient descent, regularization, cross-validation, overfitting, bias, variance, convex optimization, eigenvectors, relational databases, SQL, latency, computational complexity, sparse matrices.', 'You may be a fit for this role if you:\xa0', 'Today, nearly every business in the world\xa0has to\xa0do bookkeeping and accounting in order to file taxes, understand financial health, and most importantly, make strategic business decisions. The process is universally manual, tedious, and error prone. At the same time, the process follows well-defined rules, abides by industry standardization, and has become increasingly\xa0data-rich. It’s a product-focused machine learning team’s dream. Sage Intacct Artificial Intelligence Labs “SAIL” is a nimble team within Sage Intacct building the future of cloud accounting by leveraging artificial intelligence. The SAIL team builds capabilities to help businesses make better decisions through data-powered insights. We are looking for a Principal Machine Learning Scientist in San Francisco to help us ship AI-powered products\xa0and services. As a part of our cross-functional team, including data scientists and engineers, you will help steer the direction of the entire company’s Artificial Intelligence / Machine Learning effort and you will also be a key individual contributor.\xa0', 'Responsibilities:\xa0\xa0', 'Working with product managers to translate product/business problems into tractable machine learning problems.']

['Performing quantitative research, analysis and development on\xa0\xa0Group’s electronic/algorithmic execution trading systems. Use statistical/mathematical techniques and knowledge of US equity market structure (and microstructure) to design new trading algorithms and systems, and improve existing ones, with the goal of providing ‘best execution’ on client orders executed thru our systems. The research tasks involve developing research plans, extensive data analysis (usually with large amounts of data on orders, trades and market data) and documenting outcomes as reports and white papers. The development tasks require writing robust software using good design principles and follow practices like continuous integration for efficient development cycles. ', 'Position Description', 'Bachelor or a Master’s degree in Computer Science, with an advanced degree in a quantitative field like Statistics, Financial Mathematics, Operations Research, Machine Learning, or a directly related field. ', 'Use statistical/mathematical techniques and knowledge of US equity market structure (and microstructure) to design new trading algorithms and systems, and improve existing ones, with the goal of providing ‘best execution’ on client orders executed thru our systems. ', 'FULL-TIME ', 'The research tasks involve developing research plans, extensive data analysis (usually with large amounts of data on orders, trades and market data) and documenting outcomes as reports and white papers. ', 'Required Experience/Skills:', '2-5 years of experience in software development and 1-3 years in quantitative analysis (statistical analysis - regression analysis, time series analysis and/or machine learning). The position also will work with salespeople and clients to explain and customize our execution offering. ', 'Bachelor or a Master’s degree in Computer Science, with an advanced degree in a quantitative field like Statistics, Financial Mathematics, Operations Research, Machine Learning, or a directly related field. 2-5 years of experience in software development and 1-3 years in quantitative analysis (statistical analysis - regression analysis, time series analysis and/or machine learning). Strong object oriented design and programming skills using Java (or similar object oriented programming language) is required, with good knowledge of using efficient data structures. Experience working with data/statistical analysis software like Excel, R and Matlab, and familiarity with data visualization tools and techniques. Experience researching large data sets related to trading (tick/market data, orders and trades) is a plus. Knowledge of equity market micro-structure and TCA techniques is a plus. Candidate should be self-motivated, and have the ability to communicate complex ideas clearly and work well in a collaborative team environment. ['Senior Machine Learning Engineer – NLP ExpertNew York City - NY$150,0000 - 180,000 base + Great Benefit Package\xa0This is an opportunity for a well-rounded Data Scientist to cut their teeth in a data-first, fast paced environment where they are designing unique infrastructure to change B2B data. Working with some the leaders in the industry, you will be responsible for putting your Natural Language Processing, Machine Learning models into production. If you are an NLP, Machine Learning expert, this role could be a great fit.THE COMPANYAs a Senior Machine Learning Engineer, with and NLP focus, you’ll find yourself using machine learning techniques in this B2B powerhouse and the power of data to innovate the way we extract information form the internet.THE ROLE\xa0You will be asked to be forward thinking in your approach to applying analytical techniques to advancing the departments capacity. You will work mostly independently and use your strong analytic skills to finish projects.· \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Develop different types of machine learning models from NLP to anomaly detection· \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Develop production level code in Python and deliver high quality solutions· \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Work cross functionally with the data engineering and research analyst teams· \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Present your findings to business leaders and stakeholders within the companyYOUR SKILLS AND EXPERIENCEYou will need to be a proven problem solver, critical thinker, and have an advanced technical background to join this growing, yet experienced team. Commercial experience with hands on experience putting Machine Learning projects into production is a must,· \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Proven commercial experience with a strong understanding of Deep Learning frameworks· \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Prior exposure to putting Machine Learning and Deep Learning models into production· \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Prior work presenting key findings to stakeholders· \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Previous work in expanding the use of Machine Learning and Deep Learning· \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Ph.D. preferred in Computer Science, Linguistics, Engineering, Stats, or a related field· \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Technically sound in NLP, TensorFlow, NLTK, ELMo, GloVe, spaCy, WordNetTHE BENEFITSA base salary of $150,000 - $180,000 + amazing benefitsHOW TO APPLYPlease register your interest by sending your résumé to Sam Agre via the Apply link on this page.']

job_title: Staff Data Scientist - League Data Central, Revenue
job_text: ['', 'Responsibilities', 'Collaborate with team leadership, leading the execution and delivery of data science products that directly impact League of Legends systems and player experience ', 'Hands-on programming experience in Python and SQL', 'Required Qualifications', 'Experience with cloud data tools (AWS, GCP)', 'Familiarity with monetizations strategies in the gaming industry', 'Ph.D. in Machine Learning, AI, Statistics, Math, Physics, or related Computer Science/Quantitative field with 3+ years of industry experience, or equivalent experience', ' Collaborate with team leadership, leading the execution and delivery of data science products that directly impact League of Legends systems and player experience  Develop relationships with product and engineering teams to understand their data science needs Identify opportunities for data-driven approaches that deliver value to teams across the organization, and champion data solutions to product leads and engineers Work with stakeholders across the organization and on initiatives, gathering requirements, designing project plans, determining approaches, and defining success criteria Improve our data science practice by identifying novel techniques and technical approaches Act as a mentor to advise and level up data scientists in both data science and technical best practices ', 'Experience with Scala, Spark, big data tech (e.g., Hadoop)', 'Stakeholder management skills. Ability to build alignment, define scope, deliver, and maintain data science products', 'Experience working in an Agile environment', 'Strong written and verbal communication skills. Ability to effectively present and share information across a wide array of technical expertise and seniority within the organization', ' Ph.D. in Machine Learning, AI, Statistics, Math, Physics, or related Computer Science/Quantitative field with 3+ years of industry experience, or equivalent experience Deep knowledge of League of Legends gameplay and metagame systems (e.g. how progression through ranked ladder works) OR experience with a similar PVP competitive game Hands-on programming experience in Python and SQL Deep knowledge of data science methodologies, including machine learning, statistics, deep learning, optimization Experience in data science use cases and data engineering concepts (e.g., modeling, pipelines, distributed processing) Stakeholder management skills. Ability to build alignment, define scope, deliver, and maintain data science products Strong written and verbal communication skills. Ability to effectively present and share information across a wide array of technical expertise and seniority within the organization ', 'Desired Qualifications', 'Improve our data science practice by identifying novel techniques and technical approaches', 'Our Perks', 'Deep knowledge of data science methodologies, including machine learning, statistics, deep learning, optimization', 'Work with stakeholders across the organization and on initiatives, gathering requirements, designing project plans, determining approaches, and defining success criteria', 'Experience with data science for eCommerce ', 'Act as a mentor to advise and level up data scientists in both data science and technical best practices', 'Identify opportunities for data-driven approaches that deliver value to teams across the organization, and champion data solutions to product leads and engineers', 'Develop relationships with product and engineering teams to understand their data science needs', 'Staff Data Scientist on the League Data Central team', 'Deep knowledge of League of Legends gameplay and metagame systems (e.g. how progression through ranked ladder works) OR experience with a similar PVP competitive game', 'Experience in data science use cases and data engineering concepts (e.g., modeling, pipelines, distributed processing)', ' Experience with data science for eCommerce  Familiarity with monetizations strategies in the gaming industry Experience with Scala, Spark, big data tech (e.g., Hadoop) Experience with cloud data tools (AWS, GCP) Experience working in an Agile environment ']

['', 'We are looking for a Research Scientist Independent Contractor who will support the laboratory development, experimentation, and management of innovative multi-omic assays for novel applications in Oncology. Flexible hours, including evenings and weekends available.', '●\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Broad knowledge of molecular biology techniques, including general nucleic acid extraction (DNA/RNA), sample QC on Tapestation, Bioanalyzer or Qubit. Experience with PCR library preparation for next generation sequencing and sequencing platforms (including Illumina NextSeq and NovaSeq).', 'Job Description', '●\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience with handling blood plasma samples and cell-free nucleic acids is preferred', 'At our Company, you will help execute multi-omic assay technologies, SOPs, and laboratory workflows used to analyze samples, including isolation of nucleic acids (DNA/RNA) from banked biospecimens and QC. You will handle biospecimens in a molecular diagnostic setting with separate areas of pre-PCR and post-PCR procedures rooms. You will support sample accessioning, processing and storage workflow. You will perform production-scale NGS library preparation for DNA/RNA sequencing. You will operate high-throughput liquid handler to handle large cohorts of samples. You may be working during evenings and weekends to help the team reach overall product development timeline. You will perform quality control and quality assurance procedures, and tracking and managing data within our LIMS and Confluence systems. You will operate under the direction of the Head of Assay Development. This role requires meticulous recordkeeping, excellent attention to detail, and the ability to multi-task and be flexible with assignments and schedules.', 'What you bring:', '●\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa02-5 years of experience in a high-complexity molecular diagnostics laboratory setting in industry or academia.', '●\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Excellent time management, project management, multitasking and organizational skills.', '●\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience with sample accessioning and processing workflow.', '●\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Hands-on proficiency in managing technology transfer requirements, including guard-banding, stability studies, and in-process quality control', 'Key Duties and Responsibilities', '●\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience with physically separated pre-PCR and Post-PCR workflow for molecular diagnostics.', '●\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Understanding of basic molecular biology concept such as basis of the human genome, cancer genomics, cancer biology and cell biology. ', '●\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Practical knowledge of LIMS/database query tools (preferred).', '●\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Ability to design for automated platforms in plate-based, low-volume formats and/or microfluidics and experience working with automated liquid handlers.', '●\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Skill conducting quantitative-PCR (optional).', '●\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0BS and/or MS (or equivalent industry experience) in molecular biology, biochemistry, genetics, chemistry, or a closely related field.']

['', '-\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Excellent laboratory experience with free-space and fiber optics (alignment, gratings, lenses, collimators, spatial light modulators) and nonlinear optics (nonlinear fibers, nonlinear waveguides, high power amplifiers and lasers)', '-\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Design novel all-optical processing devices for high data rate telecommunications.', '-\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Excellent laboratory experience with free-space optics (alignment, gratings, lenses, collimators, spatial light modulators) and nonlinear optics (nonlinear waveguides, high power lasers)', 'LyteLoop is the future of data storage - “Storage in Motion”', '-\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience writing DSP algorithms in optical communications transceivers', 'Since late 2015, we have been perfecting our proprietary, patent pending photonic method of data storage which puts data in a constant state of perpetual motion. Achieved through the use of ultra-high bandwidth lasers, data now moves in an endless circulating loop, taking up less space and using less electricity.', '-\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Discuss innovative optical solutions with the engineering team to overcome challenges in optical communication systems and networks', '-\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience in designing photonic devices and subsystems for optical communications', '-\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Participate in the implementation of an apparatus related to very highly multiplexed, very high data rate, free-space optical communications', 'LyteLoop’s revolutionary “storage in motion” technique will transform how data is stored while providing a myriad of unique and customizable advantages based on the desired LyteLoop application deployed. LyteLoop now makes it possible to harness the power of data while consuming less energy. This exceptional technology not only increases data storage performance and utilization, but also reduces the total cost of ownership. Our advance offers a clear competitive edge for those coping with the limitations of wasteful data storage systems.', 'The following skills are required:', '-\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Participate in all of the optical research effort at Lyteloop', '-\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Implement error correction functionalities using photonic and optoelectronic devices.', '   Excellent theoretical and experimental skills in optical communications systems', '-\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Theoretical solid knowledge of nonlinear processes in optical materials', 'The following skills are preferred:', '-\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Working proficiency of MATLAB, Python\xa0', '-\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0PhD or MSc with 3 years of R&D experience in photonics', '-\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience with all-optical processing using linear and nonlinear techniques for optical communications', 'We offer a generous remuneration package in a modern working environment on Long Island easily commutable to/from New York City.', 'Using state of the art photonics technology Lyteloop patented IP will enable countless applications including huge power savings for Data Centers, less heat production, cybersecurity solutions and many additional applications.\xa0In order to develop its innovative ideas, Lyteloop is looking to expand its R&D team by adding an Optical Signal Processing Manager based out of our Great Neck, NY office.\xa0The role will serve as an optical signal processing and optical communications scientist for our team.', 'The successful candidate will:']

['Creating data visualizations (e.g. using Tableau, Excel, PowerPoint), presenting findings and implications to stakeholder audience; actively looking for ways to share insights with a broader internal audience. ', 'Data visualization and strong presentation skills (in addition to strong analysis skills) are key in this role to help support design decisions at scale. ', 'QUALIFICATIONS', 'Execute research studies using a broad range of methods (e.g. moderating interviews, usability, focus groups, contextual evaluations, diary studies; design and program surveys) directly, in collaboration with other research staff, or using vendors. Present findings and implications (from a single study or a combination of multiple studies and/or data sources) to stakeholder audience. Actively looking for ways to share insights with a broader internal audience on studies and latest industry trends. \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Define testable hypotheses that are relevant to the business and design approaches to addressing general user experience and product marketing questions. Turn quantitative insights into innovative solutions for future implementations Investigate and socialize new technology, processes, and/or research approaches. Lead this initiative within the research team or client as a whole (e.g. accessibility, product market research, usability best practices). \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Be a customer advocate, with a familiarity of competitive experiences and ESI research findings that you are able to apply toward evaluation of internal products and ensuring teams have a clear picture of the end users of the experience. Work closely with various stakeholders (e.g. product, design, development) to produce high quality, innovative designs that leverage research insights; contributes to the development of functional strategy. \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Mentor junior team members. ', 'Actively looking for ways to share insights with a broader internal audience on studies and latest industry trends. \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 ', 'Ability to analyze data from various logical and experiential (e.g. phone, print, web) sources is required. ', 'Experience with usability and accessibility. ', 'Execute research studies using a broad range of methods (e.g. moderating interviews, usability, focus groups, contextual evaluations, diary studies; design and program surveys) directly, in collaboration with other research staff, or using vendors. ', 'Ability to identify existing data sources, retrieve them, and work with teams to get new data sources implemented. Relationship building and maintenance are key to success in this function of the role. ', 'Mentor junior team members. ', 'Proficient in MS Office suite – Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Outlook; strong written and verbal communication skills for research communication and design recommendations. ', '\xa0', 'The UX Researcher uses knowledge of social science and experience to lead analytical, experimental, investigative and other technical fact-finding work for defining feature behavior or enhancements for significant portions of the user experience supporting product development; solving unique and complex problems that have a broad impact on the business. The researcher will influence design and business strategy to create actionable research programs that address complex user experience and product definition questions. ', 'Present findings and implications (from a single study or a combination of multiple studies and/or data sources) to stakeholder audience. ', 'ESSENTIAL FUNCTIONS ', 'Be a customer advocate, with a familiarity of competitive experiences and ESI research findings that you are able to apply toward evaluation of internal products and ensuring teams have a clear picture of the end users of the experience. ', 'Quant: Pull data from various sources using SQL and similar protocols. ', 'ESSENTIAL FUNCTIONS', 'POSITION SUMMARY ', 'Turn quantitative insights into innovative solutions for future implementations ', 'Lead this initiative within the research team or client as a whole (e.g. accessibility, product market research, usability best practices). \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 ', 'Apply expertise to new approaches – identifying new and unique ways to address UX challenges via collaboration, skill acquisition, or novel approaches to existing challenges.', 'Bachelor’s degree in related field required. 8-10 years relevant experience or 4-8 years and Master’s or PhD Degree. Experience working a problem from start to finish – defining the problem, identifying the data needed to address the problem, locating data, building the necessary model(s), and communicating the results. Data visualization and strong presentation skills (in addition to strong analysis skills) are key in this role to help support design decisions at scale. Experience creating best practices related to data science in their previous organization(s) and experience taking a business problem, identifying necessary data, designing an approach to analyzing that data, completing analysis, and visualizing those results to their teams. Ability to identify existing data sources, retrieve them, and work with teams to get new data sources implemented. Relationship building and maintenance are key to success in this function of the role. Ability to analyze data from various logical and experiential (e.g. phone, print, web) sources is required. Passion for customers and a demonstrated understanding of experience and conversion metrics is key. Social science research methods (e.g. usability, surveys, observation), qualitative and quantitative data analysis, foundational statistics. Experience with usability and accessibility. Quant: Pull data from various sources using SQL and similar protocols. Quant: Analyze data sets using appropriate statistical techniques and tools (e.g. R, Python), linking diverse sources where required. Apply knowledge of social science and ecommerce practices to create and refine UX metrics, user behavior models, and/or algorithms (including collaborating with other researchers to design research to augment quantitative results, identifying areas within products for instrumentation, etc.). Creating data visualizations (e.g. using Tableau, Excel, PowerPoint), presenting findings and implications to stakeholder audience; actively looking for ways to share insights with a broader internal audience. Apply expertise to new approaches – identifying new and unique ways to address UX challenges via collaboration, skill acquisition, or novel approaches to existing challenges.', 'Quant: Analyze data sets using appropriate statistical techniques and tools (e.g. R, Python), linking diverse sources where required. ['', 'Experience with git, GitHub, SQL, AWS (S3 and EC2), Docker, and Unix/Linux a big plus', 'Responsibilities', 'Conceive of, and implement, experiments to test hypotheses regarding (statistical) behavior of data and algorithms', 'Demonstrable experience implementing efficient data science models and deploying them in a production environment', 'Masters degree in a STEM field (e.g., statistics, machine learning, computer science, physics, engineering)', 'An ability to communicate complex data science concepts and results in a readily-understood manner', '\xa0', 'Two years of demonstrable experience working with large and noisy datasets, and particular experience with datasets that have nevertheless have sparsity in some dimension (e.g., spatially, temporally) would be a big plus', 'We are data detectives and our job is difficult because although we have Big Data, we exist in a persistent state of spatio-temporal data starvation. The work is fast-paced, highly iterative, and continuously trading off between what works and what’s best. Along with our team of data scientists, you’ll work with product managers, sales, and software engineers to build data-driven products and solutions. If you enjoy working with data to build products and solve hard problems in creative ways, you will fit right in.', 'Research and develop algorithms to model real-world systems and behavior based on actual observations', 'Translate product management, engineering, and business constraints/queries into tractable data science questions', 'US Citizen required (clearance eligible)Masters degree in a STEM field (e.g., statistics, machine learning, computer science, physics, engineering)An ability to communicate complex data science concepts and results in a readily-understood mannerTwo years of demonstrable experience working with large and noisy datasets, and particular experience with datasets that have nevertheless have sparsity in some dimension (e.g., spatially, temporally) would be a big plusDemonstrable experience implementing efficient data science models and deploying them in a production environmentExcellent coding skills (python with a solid familiarity with NumPy, SciPy, pandas strongly preferred)Experience with git, GitHub, SQL, AWS (S3 and EC2), Docker, and Unix/Linux a big plus', 'Help develop, improve, and evangelize our data science knowledge base and infrastructure', 'Iterate rapidly on everything; all of the above happens in a relatively fast paced business driven environment, and you must be comfortable with that', 'Work cross-functionally with software engineers to integrate data science models into production pipelines', 'Qualifications', 'Research and develop algorithms to model real-world systems and behavior based on actual observationsConceive of, and implement, experiments to test hypotheses regarding (statistical) behavior of data and algorithmsTranslate product management, engineering, and business constraints/queries into tractable data science questionsWork cross-functionally with software engineers to integrate data science models into production pipelinesHelp develop, improve, and evangelize our data science knowledge base and infrastructureIterate rapidly on everything; all of the above happens in a relatively fast paced business driven environment, and you must be comfortable with that', 'Excellent coding skills (python with a solid familiarity with NumPy, SciPy, pandas strongly preferred)', 'US Citizen required (clearance eligible)']

['Data ScientistNew York – New York $125,000 - $145,000 base + EOY 30% bonus + company options This is an opportunity for an innovative Data Scientist to cut their teeth in difficult problems in cutting edge, data-first, environment. You will have the opportunity to work in expanding eCommerce company that just received $300 million in their Series C funding. If you are looking for the chance to take your skills to the next level and work in an environment where your work with produce actionable commercial result – this is the role for you. THE COMPANYThis is an established brand that is expanding their team and always looking to bring on new clients in the world of fitness and well-being. They are becoming a full lifestyle brand and as a Data Scientist on this team you’ll find yourself working closely with both Data leaders and engineering teams and will enjoy the pace and innovation that runs through the company culture. For those ready for new challenges in machine learning and a fast-paced environment, you’ll enjoy the perks that this company can offer you. ', 'HOW TO APPLYPlease register your interest by sending your résumé to Sam Agre via the Apply link on this page.', 'THE ROLEAs a Data Scientist on this team, you will be asked to be forward thinking in your approach to applying analytical techniques to advancing the departments capacity. You will add to their implementation for machine learning for both internal and external projects with a lot of room for typical and advanced ML techniques: recommendations, user acquisition. With a rich and varied dataset to work from, you’ll have the chance to apply your machine learning and algorithmic techniques to behavioral data that will change the way that the advertisers will perform. You will work mostly independently and use your strong analytic skills to finish projects with strong Python coding skills.You will be using complex algorithms so strong research backgrounds are encouraged. Day-to-day will be about 80% productionizing models for deployment and 20% research.YOUR SKILLS AND EXPERIENCEYou will need to be a proven problem solver, critical thinker, and have an advanced technical background to join this growing, yet experienced team. The successful Data Scientist will likely have the following skills and experience:Ph.D. preferred with should dedication to research.Proven commercial experience with significant data sets with the ability to code from scratch in SQL and model in Python with familiarity in AWS. Prior exposure to big data technologies like Hadoop, Hive, and Spark.Have a background in computer science, statistics, or engineering with an understanding and commercial experience with Bayesian Statistics.Previous work in expanding the use of Machine Learning in a business, with strong experience in the following techniques: Deep Learning, NLP, Keras, and RNN)THE BENEFITSA competitive base salary of up to $145,000+ 30% bonus ']

['', 'Job Title: Product Strategy Advisor,(UX Researcher)', 'QUALIFICATIONS', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Ability to identify existing data sources, retrieve them, and work with teams to get new data sources implemented. Relationship building and maintenance are key to success in this function of the role.', '\xa0', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Be a customer advocate, with a familiarity of competitive experiences and ESI research findings that you are able to apply toward evaluation of internal products and ensuring teams have a clear picture of the end users of the experience.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Present findings and implications (from a single study or a combination of multiple studies and/or data sources) to stakeholder audience.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Quant: Pull data from various sources using SQL and similar protocols.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Mentor junior team members.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Apply knowledge of social science and ecommerce practices to create and refine UX metrics, user behavior models, and/or algorithms (including collaborating with other researchers to design research to augment quantitative results, identifying areas within products for instrumentation, etc.).', 'Duration: 09/07/2020 to 12/31/2020', 'The UX Researcher uses knowledge of social science and experience to lead analytical, experimental, investigative and other technical fact-finding work for defining feature behavior or enhancements for significant portions of the user experience supporting product development; solving unique and complex problems that have a broad impact on the business. The researcher will influence design and business strategy to create actionable research programs that address complex user experience and product definition questions. ', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience creating best practices related to data science in their previous organization(s) and experience taking a business problem, identifying necessary data, designing an approach to analyzing that data, completing analysis, and visualizing those results to their teams.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Passion for customers and a demonstrated understanding of experience and conversion metrics is key.\xa0', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Execute research studies using a broad range of methods (e.g. moderating interviews, usability, focus groups, contextual evaluations, diary studies; design and program surveys) directly, in collaboration with other research staff, or using vendors.', 'ESSENTIAL FUNCTIONS', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Bachelor’s degree in related field required.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience with usability and accessibility.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Actively looking for ways to share insights with a broader internal audience on studies and latest industry trends.\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Define testable hypotheses that are relevant to the business and design approaches to addressing general user experience and product marketing questions.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Lead this initiative within the research team or ESI as a whole (e.g. accessibility, product market research, usability best practices).\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0', 'Apply expertise to new approaches – identifying new and unique ways to address UX challenges via collaboration, skill acquisition, or novel approaches to existing challenges.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience driving best practices related to product research in their previous organization(s).', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Social science research methods (e.g. usability, surveys, observation), qualitative and quantitative data analysis, foundational statistics.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Work closely with various stakeholders (e.g. product, design, development) to produce high quality, innovative designs that leverage research insights; contributes to the development of functional strategy.\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Creating data visualizations (e.g. using Tableau, Excel, PowerPoint), presenting findings and implications to stakeholder audience; actively looking for ways to share insights with a broader internal audience.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Data visualization and strong presentation skills (in addition to strong analysis skills) are key in this role to help support design decisions at scale.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa08-10 years relevant experience or 4-8 years and Master’s or PhD Degree.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Quant: Analyze data sets using appropriate statistical techniques and tools (e.g. R, Python), linking diverse sources where required.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Investigate and socialize new technology, processes, and/or research approaches.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Quant: Knowledge of SQL, Excel, R or Python (or SPSS).', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Proficient in MS Office suite – Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Outlook; ['', ' Implementation experience with enterprise security solutions such as WAF, IPS, Anti-DDOS, and SIEM', 'Basic Qualifications', ' This is a customer facing role. You will be required to travel to client locations and deliver professional services when needed.', 'Description', 'Company', ' Experience automating IT & security tasks', ' Expertise – Customers using AWS are collecting more data than ever before about their network, infrastructure, services, applications, and users. There is a broad canvas of security-related data waiting to be tapped to help our customers know their information resources and keep them safe. You’re an expert with data – envisioning scenarios, cleaning data, gaining initial insight, building models, iterating, and bringing action from insight. Solutions – You like working with customers to solve problems and identify opportunities in their security approach and implementation. You’ll define and deliver on-site technical engagements with partners and customers. This includes not only delivering custom solution engagements, but also participating in pre-sales on-site visits, understanding customer security and compliance requirements, evaluating their data and analytics readiness, and proposing and delivering packaged offerings. Delivery - Lead the hands-on execution of customer engagements and internal builder projects. Customer engagements include migration of existing functionality, evolution of existing capabilities and process, and development of new applications using AWS cloud services. Practice Development – Helping customers is our number one goal – but it’s not our only goal. With each engagement, you’re looking for ways to collect, capture, package and share your knowledge with new customers, partners, and AWS employees. You are a force-multiplier – developing tools, services, and new artifacts to help others build on the work you deliver. This is a customer facing role. You will be required to travel to client locations and deliver professional services when needed.', 'Responsibilities Include', ' Practice Development – Helping customers is our number one goal – but it’s not our only goal. With each engagement, you’re looking for ways to collect, capture, package and share your knowledge with new customers, partners, and AWS employees. You are a force-multiplier – developing tools, services, and new artifacts to help others build on the work you deliver.', ' Delivery - Lead the hands-on execution of customer engagements and internal builder projects. ['Work with partners including the Executive, Product, Data and Design teams to assist with data-related technical issues and support their data infrastructure needs. ', 'Cognizant will not be able to provide sponsorship for this role. Candidates have the option of working remotely.', 'Responsibilities: ', '3+ years of experience (Mid-level) Strong Programming experience with object-oriented/object function scripting languages: Python/Scala, Spark. ', 'About AI & Analytics: Artificial intelligence (AI) and the data it collects and analyzes will soon sit at the core of all intelligent, human-centric businesses. By decoding customer needs, preferences, and behaviors, our clients can understand exactly what services, products, and experiences their consumers need. Within AI & Analytics, we work to design the future—a future in which trial-and-error business decisions have been replaced by informed choices and data-supported strategies. ', 'Cognizant is looking for Python/AWS Developer to join our Artificial Intelligence and Analytics practice (AIA) for a remote project. As a trusted advisor, responsible for providing an approach for the overall project. As a domain specialist, you will drive technology discussions and analyze the existing gaps in addressing business needs. You are a thought leader-comfortable challenging the status quo to enhance our current services and technologies. ', 'Candidate with 5+ years of experience in a Data Engineer role, who has attained a Graduate degree in Computer Science, Statistics, Informatics, Information Systems or another quantitative field. 3+ years of experience (Mid-level) Strong Programming experience with object-oriented/object function scripting languages: Python/Scala, Spark. 3+ years of experience (Mid-level) Experience with big data tools: Hadoop, Apache Spark, Kafka, etc 1+ years of experience with AWS cloud services: S3, EC2, EMR, RDS, Redshift Experience with stream-processing systems: Storm, Spark-Streaming, etc. (Nice to have) 1+ Years of experience with relational SQL, Snowflake and NoSQL databases, including Postgres and Cassandra. ', '1+ Years of experience with relational SQL, Snowflake and NoSQL databases, including Postgres and Cassandra. ', 'Build the infrastructure required for optimal extraction, transformation, and loading of data from a wide variety of data sources using SQL and AWS ‘Big data’ technologies. ', 'Identify, design, and implement internal process improvements: automating manual processes, optimizing data delivery, re-designing infrastructure for greater scalability etc. ', 'Qualifications: ', 'Create and maintain optimal data pipeline architecture, Assemble large, sophisticated data sets that meet functional / non-functional business requirements. ', ' ', 'Experience with stream-processing systems: Storm, Spark-Streaming, etc. (Nice to have) ', 'Create and maintain optimal data pipeline architecture, Assemble large, sophisticated data sets that meet functional / non-functional business requirements. Identify, design, and implement internal process improvements: automating manual processes, optimizing data delivery, re-designing infrastructure for greater scalability etc. Build the infrastructure required for optimal extraction, transformation, and loading of data from a wide variety of data sources using SQL and AWS ‘Big data’ technologies. Build analytics tools that utilize the data pipeline to deliver impactful insights into customer acquisition, operational efficiency and other key business performance metrics. Work with partners including the Executive, Product, Data and Design teams to assist with data-related technical issues and support their data infrastructure needs. Create data tools for analytics and data scientist team members that assist them in building and optimizing our product into an innovative industry leader. ', 'Candidate with 5+ years of experience in a Data Engineer role, who has attained a Graduate degree in Computer Science, Statistics, Informatics, Information Systems or another quantitative field. ', '3+ years of experience (Mid-level) Experience with big data tools: Hadoop, Apache Spark, Kafka, etc ', 'Build analytics tools that utilize the data pipeline to deliver impactful insights into customer acquisition, operational efficiency and other key business performance metrics. ', 'By applying AI and data science, we help leading companies to prototype, refine, validate, and scale their AI and analytics products and delivery models. Cognizant’s AIA practice takes insights that are buried in data, and provides businesses a clear way to transform how they source, interpret and consume their information. Our clients need flexible data structures and a streamlined data architecture that quickly turns data resources into informative, meaningful intelligence. ', '\xa0 ', '1+ years of experience with AWS cloud services: S3, EC2, EMR, RDS, Redshift ', 'Create data tools for analytics and data scientist team members that assist them in building and optimizing our product into an innovative industry leader. ']

All such references should be understood to refer to Truist moving forward while we continue to transition to the Truist name.', 'Required Skills and Competencies']

['', 'Cognizant will not be able to provide sponsorship for this role. Candidates have the option of working remotely.', '4 plus years of experience working on      Spark, Scala and Python. ', 'Responsibilities: ', 'Create and maintain optimal data pipeline      architecture, Assemble large, sophisticated data sets that meet functional      / non-functional business requirements. ', 'Responsibilities:', 'Should be good in cloud databases like dynamodb, cloud data warehouse like snowflake Should be independent in working and story interpretation and ready to start from Day 1 Excellent communication and teamwork skills Experience on workflow automation / scheduling tools like Airflow Machine Learning Experience with tools such as H2O ', 'Experience on workflow automation / scheduling tools like Airflow ', 'Qualifications:', 'Should be independent in working and story interpretation and ready to start from Day 1 ', 'About AI & Analytics: Artificial intelligence (AI) and the data it collects and analyzes will soon sit at the core of all intelligent, human-centric businesses. By decoding customer needs, preferences, and behaviors, our clients can understand exactly what services, products, and experiences their consumers need. Within AI & Analytics, we work to design the future—a future in which trial-and-error business decisions have been replaced by informed choices and data-supported strategies. ', 'Excellent communication and teamwork skills ', ' Create and maintain optimal data pipeline      architecture, Assemble large, sophisticated data sets that meet functional      / non-functional business requirements.  Identify, design, and implement internal      process improvements: automating manual processes, optimizing data      delivery, re-designing infrastructure for greater scalability etc.  Build the infrastructure required for      optimal extraction, transformation, and loading of data from a wide      variety of data sources using SQL and AWS ‘Big data’ technologies.  Build analytics tools that utilize the      data pipeline to deliver impactful insights into customer acquisition,      operational efficiency and other key business performance metrics.  Work with partners including the      Executive, Product, Data and Design teams to assist with data-related technical      issues and support their data infrastructure needs.  Create data tools for analytics and data      scientist team members that assist them in building and optimizing our      product into an innovative industry leader.  ', '5 plus years of experience working on      AWS, S3, Glue, EMR, Redshift, RDS. ', 'Qualifications: ', 'Should be good in cloud databases like dynamodb, cloud data warehouse like snowflake ', ' ', 'Machine Learning Experience with tools such as H2O ', 'Create data tools for analytics and data      scientist team members that assist them in building and optimizing our      product into an innovative industry leader. ', 'Cognizant is looking for Spark Developer to join our Artificial Intelligence and Analytics practice (AIA) for a remote project. As a trusted advisor, responsible for providing an approach for the overall project. As a domain specialist, you will drive technology discussions and analyze the existing gaps in addressing business needs. You are a thought leader-comfortable challenging the status quo to enhance our current services and technologies. ', 'Build analytics tools that utilize the      data pipeline to deliver impactful insights into customer acquisition,      operational efficiency and other key business performance metrics. ', 'By applying AI and data science, we help leading companies to prototype, refine, validate, and scale their AI and analytics products and delivery models. Cognizant’s AIA practice takes insights that are buried in data, and provides businesses a clear way to transform how they source, interpret and consume their information. Our clients need flexible data structures and a streamlined data architecture that quickly turns data resources into informative, meaningful intelligence. ', ' 5 plus years of experience working on      AWS, S3, Glue, EMR, Redshift, RDS.  4 plus years of experience working on      Spark, Scala and Python.  ', 'Identify, design, and implement internal      process improvements: automating manual processes, optimizing data      delivery, re-designing infrastructure for greater scalability etc. ', 'Work with partners including the      Executive, Product, Data and Design teams to assist with data-related technical      issues and support their data infrastructure needs. ', '\xa0 ', 'Build the infrastructure required for      optimal extraction, transformation, and loading of data from a wide      variety of data sources using SQL and AWS ‘Big data’ technologies. ']

['Build tooling and automation around data pipelines that improve the efficiency, quality and resiliency of our data platform ', 'Required Skills', 'Develop solutions that enable internal analysts to efficiently extract insights from data. This includes owning the ingestion (web scrapes, S3/FTP sync, bespoke processes), transformations (Python, Perl) and interface (API, schema design, events, etc.) ', 'Proficiency with RDBMS, NoSQL, distributed compute platforms such as Spark, Dask or Hadoop ', 'Enterprise Data Engineer', 'Working knowledge of statistics, predictive analytics or machine learning techniques ', 'A passion for working with data and developing software to address data processing challenges ', 'Enterprise Data Engineers build pipelines that support datasets used by all investment teams and strategies across the firm. They manage the firm’s most critical data sets and focus on applying software development best practices to solve complex data challenges. The expectation is that the data engineer has sound programming skills, strong business acumen, and a strong interest in finance. ', 'New York, NY', 'Key Responsibilities ', 'Data Engineers are the architects of the next generation platforms that control how the firm interacts with and consumes information. They own the entire data pipeline starting with how we ingest data from the outside world, through the transformation of data into actionable insights, and finally the interfaces and APIs that our analysts and portfolio managers use to monetize that information. Throughout that process our data engineers work closely with investment professionals and researchers to design systems that answer some of the most challenging questions in the hedge fund industry. ', 'Develop solutions that enable internal analysts to efficiently extract insights from data. This includes owning the ingestion (web scrapes, S3/FTP sync, bespoke processes), transformations (Python, Perl) and interface (API, schema design, events, etc.) Build tooling and automation around data pipelines that improve the efficiency, quality and resiliency of our data platform Partner with internal analysts, quants and data scientists to design, develop, test and deploy solutions that answer fundamental questions about financial markets. Take on an entrepreneurial mentality by building and selling your own ideas. We work in an evolving space and we expect you to help design our evolution by challenging the status quo and independently identifying opportunities to improve the entire data organization. ', 'Partner with internal analysts, quants and data scientists to design, develop, test and deploy solutions that answer fundamental questions about financial markets. ', 'Advanced technical communication skills ', 'A passion for working with data and developing software to address data processing challenges Proficiency with Python, C++, Java or equivalent Proficiency with RDBMS, NoSQL, distributed compute platforms such as Spark, Dask or Hadoop Prior experience building data pipelines from structured or unstructured data preferably including web crawlers Prior work developing BI tooling and/or application development for data analytics Advanced technical communication skills Working knowledge of statistics, predictive analytics or machine learning techniques Strong business acumen with prior experience in investment research or direct exposure to product or data science teams AND passionate about using data for investment decisions', 'Prior experience building data pipelines from structured or unstructured data preferably including web crawlers ', 'Prior work developing BI tooling and/or application development for data analytics ', 'Strong business acumen with prior experience in investment research or direct exposure to product or data science teams AND passionate about using data for investment decisions', '\xa0 ', 'Proficiency with Python, C++, Java or equivalent ', 'New York, NY ', 'Required Skills ', 'Key Responsibilities', 'Take on an entrepreneurial mentality by building and selling your own ideas. We work in an evolving space and we expect you to help design our evolution by challenging the status quo and independently identifying opportunities to improve the entire data organization. ', 'Enterprise Data Engineer ']

['', '· \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 You will report directly into the VP of Data Science and work closely on technical direction ', '$240,000-260,000 base salary + bonus ', 'This role will be the internal, go to technical lead for this cutting edge food/tech company. ', '· \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Commercial experience building machine learning and deep learning models in a production is must ', 'YOUR SKILLS AND EXPERIENCE ', '\xa0', 'THE ROLE', 'Technical Team Lead - Machine Learning New York City, New York $240,000-260,000 base salary + bonus +\xa0benefits ', '· \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 History of thinking outside-the-box with minimal direction for project execution (Very much an ideas position) ', 'HOW TO APPLY', '· \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Prior experience leading projects is necessary especially concerning building ML infrustructure and maintaining the infrustructure ', 'THE BENEFITS  A competitive base salary of $240,000-260,000 + bonus + benefits   HOW TO APPLY  Please register your interest by sending your résumé to Sam Agre via the Apply link on this page.  KEYWORDS  Machine Learning | Deep Learning | Python | TensorFlow | PyTorch | Technology | Data Science | Keras | Spark', '· \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Deep learning framework experience in PyTorch, TensorFlow, Keras or similar state of the art techniques ', 'The successful MLE will likely have the following skills and experience: ', '\xa0benefits', '· \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Role will be responsible for production grade code and research include advanced NLP and recommendation projects ', ' ', 'YOUR SKILLS AND EXPERIENCE', '· \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Work closely with the Product/Marketing/Engineering teams building models from concept to production ', '· \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Experience mentoring junior team members ', 'Technical Team Lead - Machine Learning', 'THE BENEFITS', '\xa0 ', '· \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Coding experience using Python, R, Spark, Hadoop and AWS for predictive modeling and data manipulation  ', '· \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 You will be responsible for machine learning and deep learning model development for support across different areas of the business ', 'THE ROLE ', "This is an opportunity for a Machine Learning Engineer to take their talents to a food delivery tech firm who are continuing to grow despite the current climate. This position calls for a seasoned leader in cutting-edge deep learning practices who enjoys one of the food favorites in America. ", '· \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 You will implement and design code and build out to production using various advanced statistical techniques with access to proprietary data ', 'KEYWORDS', '· \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 MS/PhD in Computer Science or quantitative field highly preferred  ', 'New York City, New York', '· \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Experience with analyzing large-scale datasets a must ']

['', 'You’ll investigate data, construct a hypothesis, and think deeply about the results. \xa0After several iterations, you will discover something new. \xa0Instead of writing a paper, you will actually apply your ideas in the real world and see them working. ', 'You’ll need to care more about analysis being correct then achieving a p-value below 0.05. ', 'What you’ll do ', 'You’ll investigate data, construct a hypothesis, and think deeply about the results. \xa0After several iterations, you will discover something new. \xa0Instead of writing a paper, you will actually apply your ideas in the real world and see them working. You’ll need to care more about analysis being correct then achieving a p-value below 0.05. You’ll collaborate with a group of colleagues with a variety of backgrounds in a process of scientific inquiry. By honestly and openly reviewing others’ work, and having your work reviewed by them, you’ll be a guardian of the research process at Theorem. We’re using ideas across multiple disciplines: computer science, machine learning, statistics and biostatistics including survival analysis, supervised learning, natural language processing, imbalanced data, feature extraction and selection, and many, many other areas.', 'A high level of mathematical and statistical literacy, and an intense interest in applying quantitative analysis to do first class research. You should be a good scientist. \xa0You need to know when you have something and when you don’t, you cannot be fooled by randomness. You must be comfortable and enjoy working with data. \xa0This is the lifeblood of our business, your hypotheses start there and your testing ends there. You should be creative. \xa0You will be coming up with original hypotheses to expand and refine our understanding of the world, and a framework to validate them. You must be comfortable writing code. \xa0Nobody will be doing it for you. \xa0The better you are at it, the more efficiently you can explore the model space and find winning ideas. Research background devising novel approaches to solving problems and applying them to real world data to achieve robust, repeatable results. Knowledge of finance is cool – but in no way a requirement. ', 'We’re using ideas across multiple disciplines: computer science, machine learning, statistics and biostatistics including survival analysis, supervised learning, natural language processing, imbalanced data, feature extraction and selection, and many, many other areas.', 'A high level of mathematical and statistical literacy, and an intense interest in applying quantitative analysis to do first class research. ', 'You’ll collaborate with a group of colleagues with a variety of backgrounds in a process of scientific inquiry. ', 'Research background devising novel approaches to solving problems and applying them to real world data to achieve robust, repeatable results. ', 'You must be comfortable and enjoy working with data. \xa0This is the lifeblood of our business, your hypotheses start there and your testing ends there. ', 'Knowledge of finance is cool – but in no way a requirement. ', ' ', 'You must be comfortable writing code. \xa0Nobody will be doing it for you. \xa0The better you are at it, the more efficiently you can explore the model space and find winning ideas. ', "We are a small team of fewer than 15 with a diversity of ideas and backgrounds applying machine learning, software engineering and rigorous scientific investigation to revamp the lending and securitization space. Every member of the team has a major impact on the company's success, and gets to see their contributions working in the real world. Building good financial forecasting models is extremely challenging from both a technology and research point of view. ", 'You should be creative. \xa0You will be coming up with original hypotheses to expand and refine our understanding of the world, and a framework to validate them. ', 'Quantitative Researcher ', 'What you bring to the table', 'What you bring to the table ', 'Quantitative Researcher', 'We are based in San Francisco, close to Caltrain and BART. ', 'What you’ll do', 'We combine quantitative research, software engineering and rigorous scientific investigation to build credit portfolios that produce strong and consistent yields across business cycles.\xa0\xa0 ', 'By honestly and openly reviewing others’ work, and having your work reviewed by them, you’ll be a guardian of the research process at Theorem. Algebra, etc.)- Experience in model evaluation, feature engineering, and time series analytics ', 'Collaborate closely with product designers on best uses of quantitative DS methods in new & existing C++, Python, or Java ', 'Work with a team of Data Scientists & developers to design, experiment, and evaluate models ', 'BA, BS, MS, PhD in Computer Science, Engineering or related technology field A strong quantitative background (Probability Theory, Statistics, Linear Algebra, etc.)- Experience in model evaluation, feature engineering, and time series analytics A track record of relevant research- 3+ years experience applying these skills 3+ years of experience programming in C++, Python, or Java ', 'Experience in Deep Learning methods and their applications ', 'BA, BS, MS, PhD in Computer Science, Engineering or related technology field ', "Machine Learning Engineer – EquitiesNew York, NY - USA\xa0For over 30 years, our clients have relied on our core product to access the data and analytics they need to make informed investment decisions. We absorb billions of data points from hundreds of financial markets every single day. Our teams build applications that fuel the markets by providing intelligent analytics and transparency to level the playing field. We share a real passion for solving today’s problems by innovating for tomorrow.\xa0We're building a new team, starting small, with researchers and engineers, whose goal is to leverage modern data science to enhance and extend our firm’s Equities suite of functionality. We will be working closely with product designers to understand how we could improve or optimize their products, including feature engineering, improved relevancy metrics, sentiment extraction, and more. We also intend to actively pursue research in the domain, publish papers, attend conferences, and represent the company in the industry.\xa0We leverage modern open source tools and will also work closely with an existing, dedicated team of infrastructure developers for big-data and distributed analytics. Our ultimate goals are new, novel applications of data science in the equity domain and making such analysis easy and quick for our clients.\xa0We'll trust you to: ", 'Publish such findings, present at conferences, and represent the company in the industry ']
